args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string ip = "127.0.0.1";Di2015NewLine        int port = 14500;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        TcpListener server = new TcpListener(IPAddress.Parse(ip), port);Di2015NewLine        server.Start();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Server started...");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (true)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            connected.Reset();Di2015NewLine            server.BeginAcceptTcpClient(new AsyncCallback(AcceptCallback), server);Di2015NewLine            connected.WaitOne();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void AcceptCallback(IAsyncResult ar)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        TcpListener listener = (TcpListener)ar.AsyncState;Di2015NewLine        TcpClient client = listener.EndAcceptTcpClient(ar);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        byte[] buffer = new byte[1024];Di2015NewLine        NetworkStream ns = client.GetStream();Di2015NewLine        if (ns.CanRead)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ns.BeginRead(buffer, 0, buffer.Length, new AsyncCallback(ReadCallback), new object[] { ns, buffer });Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        connected.Set();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void ReadCallback(IAsyncResult ar)Di2015NewLine ns.EndRead(ar);Di2015NewLine        if (n > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(Encoding.ASCII.GetString(buffer, 0, n));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        ns.BeginRead(buffer, 0, buffer.Length, new AsyncCallback(ReadCallback), new object[] { ns, buffer });Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5334054Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class PostFieldLengthSpecification : ISpecification<Post>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private  const string TITLE_LENGTH_RANGE = "5-100";Di2015NewLine    private  const string BODY_LENGTH_RANGE = "20-10000";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool IsSatisfiedBy(Post post)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return this.GetErrors(post).IsValid;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ModelStateDictionary GetErrors(Post post)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ModelStateDictionary modelState = new ModelStateDictionary();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!post.Title.Trim().Length.Within(TITLE_LENGTH_RANGE))Di2015NewLine            modelState.AddModelError(StongTypeHelpers.GetPropertyName((Post p) => p.Title),Di2015NewLine                "Please make sure the title is between {0} characters in length".With(TITLE_LENGTH_RANGE));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!post.BodyMarkup.Trim().Length.Within(BODY_LENGTH_RANGE))Di2015NewLine            modelState.AddModelError(StongTypeHelpers.GetPropertyName((Post p) => p.BodyMarkup),Di2015NewLine                "Please make sure the post is between {0} characters in length".With(BODY_LENGTH_RANGE));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return modelState;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5337306Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static bool DeleteFileOnServer(Uri serverUri)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // The serverUri parameter should use the ftp:// scheme.Di2015NewLine    // It contains the name of the server file that is to be deleted.Di2015NewLine    // Example: ftp://contoso.com/someFile.txt.Di2015NewLine    // Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (serverUri.Scheme != Uri.UriSchemeFtp)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // Get the object used to communicate with the server.Di2015NewLine    FtpWebRequest request = (FtpWebRequest)WebRequest.Create(serverUri);Di2015NewLine    request.Method = WebRequestMethods.Ftp.DeleteFile;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    FtpWebResponse response = (FtpWebResponse) request.GetResponse();Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Delete status: {0}",response.StatusDescription);  Di2015NewLine    response.Close();Di2015NewLine    return true;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5337411Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic DateTime AddBusinessDays(List<DateTime> businessDays, DateTime startDate, TimeSpan span)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Add the initial timespanDi2015NewLine    DateTime endDate = startDate.Add(span);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Calculate the number of holidays by taking off the number of business days during the periodDi2015NewLine    int noOfHolidays = span.Days - businessDays.Where(d => d >= startDate && d <= endDate).Count();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Add the no. of holidays foundDi2015NewLine    endDate.AddDays(noOfHolidays);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return endDate;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5343033Di2015UniqueSeparator    public class Range<T> where T : IComparable<T>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine            /// <summary>Di2015NewLine            /// Minimum value of the rangeDi2015NewLine            /// </summary>Di2015NewLine            public T Minimum { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            /// <summary>Di2015NewLine            /// Maximum value of the rangeDi2015NewLine            /// </summary>Di2015NewLine            public T Maximum { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            /// <summary>Di2015NewLine            /// Presents the Range in readable formatDi2015NewLine            /// </summary>Di2015NewLine            /// <returns>String representation of the Range</returns>Di2015NewLine            public override string ToString() { return String.Format("[{0} - {1}]", Minimum, Maximum); }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            /// <summary>Di2015NewLine            /// Determines if the range is validDi2015NewLine            /// </summary>Di2015NewLine            /// <returns>True if range is valid, else false</returns>Di2015NewLine            public Boolean IsValid() { return Minimum.CompareTo(Maximum) <= 0; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            /// <summary>Di2015NewLine            /// Determines if the provided value is inside the rangeDi2015NewLine            /// </summary>Di2015NewLine            /// <param name="value">The value to test</param>Di2015NewLine            /// <returns>True if the value is inside Range, else false</returns>Di2015NewLine            public Boolean ContainsValue(T value)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                    return (Minimum.CompareTo(value) <= 0) && (value.CompareTo(Maximum) <= 0);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            /// <summary>Di2015NewLine            /// Determines if this Range is inside the bounds of another rangeDi2015NewLine            /// </summary>Di2015NewLine            /// <param name="Range">The parent range to test on</param>Di2015NewLine            /// <returns>True if range is inclusive, else false</returns>Di2015NewLine            public Boolean IsInsideRange(Range<T> Range)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                    return this.IsValid() && Range.IsValid() && Range.ContainsValue(this.Minimum) && Range.ContainsValue(this.Maximum);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            /// <summary>Di2015NewLine            /// Determines if another range is inside the bounds of this rangeDi2015NewLine            /// </summary>Di2015NewLine            /// <param name="Range">The child range to test</param>Di2015NewLine            /// <returns>True if range is inside, else false</returns>Di2015NewLine            public Boolean ContainsRange(Range<T> Range)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                    return this.IsValid() && Range.IsValid() && this.ContainsValue(Range.Minimum) && this.ContainsValue(Range.Maximum);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

5344443Di2015UniqueSeparatorAssert.AreEqual(2, LevenshteinDistance("Hello there!", "Helothere!");Di2015NewLineAssert.AreEqual(1, LevenshteinDistance("Hello there!", "Hello there!!"));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineAssert.AreEqual(4, LevenshteinDistance("Hello there! How are you?", "Helothere!! How a re you?"));Di2015NewLineAssert.AreEqual(3, LevenshteinDistance("Hello there! How are you?", "Hello there!@ Ho are yu??"));  //fails, returns 4 errorsDi2015NewLine
5344443Di2015UniqueSeparatorAssert.AreEqual(7, LevenshteinDistance("Hello there! How are you?", "Hlothere!! Hw a reYou?");  //fails, returns 8 errorsDi2015NewLine
5344443Di2015UniqueSeparatorint LevenshteinDistance(string left, string right)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (left == null || right == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return -1;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (left.Length == 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return right.Length;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (right.Length == 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return left.Length;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int[,] distance = new int[left.Length + 1, right.Length + 1];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i <= left.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        distance[i, 0] = i;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int j = 0; j <= right.Length; j++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        distance[0, j] = j;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 1; i <= left.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int j = 1; j <= right.Length; j++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (right[j - 1] == left[i - 1])Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                distance[i, j] = distance[i - 1, j - 1];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                distance[i, j] = Min(distance[i - 1, j] + 1,      //deletionDi2015NewLine                                     distance[i, j - 1] + 1,      //insertionDi2015NewLine                                     distance[i - 1, j - 1] + 1); //substitutionDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return distance[left.Length, right.Length];Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineint Min(int val1, int val2, int val3)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return Math.Min(val1, Math.Min(val2, val3));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

});Di2015NewLine        sw.Stop();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Parallel: " + sw.ElapsedMilliseconds);Di2015NewLine        Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void Compress(FileInfo fi)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (FileStream inFile = fi.OpenRead())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if ((File.GetAttributes(fi.FullName)Di2015NewLine                & FileAttributes.Hidden)Di2015NewLine                != FileAttributes.Hidden & fi.Extension != ".gz")Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                using (FileStream outFile =Di2015NewLine                            File.Create(fi.FullName + ".gz"))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    using (GZipStream Compress =Di2015NewLine                        new GZipStream(outFile,Di2015NewLine                        CompressionMode.Compress))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        inFile.CopyTo(Compress);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5349641Di2015UniqueSeparator<%@ WebHandler Language='C#' Class='LandscapeToPortrait' %>Di2015NewLineusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineusing System.Web;Di2015NewLineusing iTextSharp.text;Di2015NewLineusing iTextSharp.text.pdf;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class LandscapeToPortrait : IHttpHandler {Di2015NewLine  public void ProcessRequest (HttpContext context) {Di2015NewLine    HttpResponse Response = context.Response;Di2015NewLine    Response.ContentType = "application/pdf";Di2015NewLine    PdfReader[] readers = {Di2015NewLine      new PdfReader(CreateReaderBytes(false)),Di2015NewLine      new PdfReader(CreateReaderBytes(true))Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using (Document doc = new Document()) {Di2015NewLine      using (PdfCopy copy = new PdfCopy(doc, Response.OutputStream)) {Di2015NewLine        doc.Open();Di2015NewLine        foreach (PdfReader reader in readers) {Di2015NewLine          int n = reader.NumberOfPages;Di2015NewLine          for (int page = 0; page < n;) {Di2015NewLine            ++page;Di2015NewLine            float width = reader.GetPageSize(page).Width;Di2015NewLine            float height = reader.GetPageSize(page).Height;Di2015NewLine            if (width > height) {Di2015NewLine              PdfDictionary pageDict = reader.GetPageN(page);Di2015NewLine              pageDict.Put(PdfName.ROTATE, new PdfNumber(90));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            copy.AddPage(copy.GetImportedPage(reader, page));Di2015NewLine          }Di2015NewLine        }        Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  public bool IsReusable {Di2015NewLine    get { return false; }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  public byte[] CreateReaderBytes(bool isLandscape) {Di2015NewLine    using (MemoryStream ms = new MemoryStream()) {Di2015NewLine      Rectangle r = isLandscapeDi2015NewLine        ? new Rectangle(792, 612)Di2015NewLine        : PageSize.LETTERDi2015NewLine      ;Di2015NewLine      using (Document doc = new Document(r)) {Di2015NewLine        PdfWriter.GetInstance(doc, ms);Di2015NewLine        doc.Open();Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < 5; ++i) {Di2015NewLine          doc.Add(new Phrase("hello world"));Di2015NewLine          doc.NewPage();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      return ms.ToArray();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
5349644Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar rng = new RNGCryptoServiceProvider();Di2015NewLinevar key = new byte[24];Di2015NewLinerng.GetBytes(key);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinefor(var i = 0; i < key.Length; ++i)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int keyByte = key[i] & 0xFE;Di2015NewLine    var parity = 0;Di2015NewLine    for (var b = keyByte; b != 0; b >>= 1) parity ^= b & 1;Di2015NewLine    key[i] = (byte)(keyByte | (parity == 0 ? 1 : 0));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinereturn key;Di2015NewLine

5352241Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class CardDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public int Value { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine    public enum SuitTypeDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Clubs, Spades, Hearts, DiamondsDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public SuitType Suit { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine    public Card(int value, SuitType suit)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Suit = suit;Di2015NewLine        Value = value;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public Card(string input)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (input == null || input.Length < 2 || input.Length > 2)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException();Di2015NewLine        switch (input[0])Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case 'C': case 'c':Di2015NewLine                Suit = SuitType.Clubs;Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case 'S': case 's':Di2015NewLine                Suit = SuitType.Spades;Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case 'H': case 'h':Di2015NewLine                Suit = SuitType.Hearts;Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case 'D': case 'd':Di2015NewLine                Suit = SuitType.Diamonds;Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            default:Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentException();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        int uncheckedValue = (int)input[1];Di2015NewLine        if (uncheckedValue > 14 || uncheckedValue < 1)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException();Di2015NewLine        Value = uncheckedValue;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public string encode()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string encodedCard = "";Di2015NewLine        switch (Suit)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case SuitType.Clubs:Di2015NewLine                encodedCard += 'c';Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case SuitType.Spades:Di2015NewLine                encodedCard += 's';Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case SuitType.Hearts:Di2015NewLine                encodedCard += 'h';Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case SuitType.Diamonds:Di2015NewLine                encodedCard += 'd';Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        encodedCard += (char) Value;Di2015NewLine        return encodedCard;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public override string ToString()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string output = "";Di2015NewLine        if (Value > 10)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            switch (Value)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                case 11:Di2015NewLine                    output += "Jack";Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                case 12:Di2015NewLine                    output += "Queen";Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                case 13:Di2015NewLine                    output += "King";Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                case 14:Di2015NewLine                    output += "Ace";Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            output += Value;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        output += " of " + System.Enum.GetName(typeof(SuitType), Suit);Di2015NewLine        return output;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5359522Di2015UniqueSeparatorBackBufferStride
5359522Di2015UniqueSeparatorunsafeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int colorOffset = 0;Di2015NewLine    int pixelOffset = 0;Di2015NewLine    byte color = 0;Di2015NewLine    byte* pBackBuffer = (byte*)_image.BackBuffer;Di2015NewLine    for(int y = 0; y < mapData.Height; y++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // get a pointer to first pixel in a line yDi2015NewLine        byte* pixLine = pBackBuffer;Di2015NewLine        for(int x = 0; x < mapData.Width; x++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // fix #1: offset = y * width + x, not y * height + xDi2015NewLine            var mapOffset = y * mapData.Width + x;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (mapData.Data[mapOffset])Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //Set the pixel to whiteDi2015NewLine                color += 1;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Shift the pixel position by 1Di2015NewLine            color = (byte)(color << 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //If 8 pixels have been written, write it to the backbufferDi2015NewLine            if(++colorOffset == 8)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                *pixLine++ = color;Di2015NewLine                color = 0;Di2015NewLine                colorOffset = 0;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // fix #2: copy any pixels leftDi2015NewLine        if(colorOffset != 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            *pixLine++ = color;Di2015NewLine            colorOffset = 0;Di2015NewLine            color = 0;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // fix #3: next line offset = previous line + stride, they are alignedDi2015NewLine        pBackBuffer += _image.BackBufferStride;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    //Update the imageDi2015NewLine    _image.AddDirtyRect(new Int32Rect(0, 0, mapData.Width, mapData.Height));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5362128Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic Expression<Func<TContainer,bool>> CreatePredicate<TContainer,TMember>(Di2015NewLine    Expression<Func<TContainer,TMember>> getMemberExpression, Di2015NewLine    Expression<Func<TMember,bool>> memberPredicateExpression)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return CombineExpressionVisitor.Combine(Di2015NewLine        getMemberExpression,Di2015NewLine        memberPredicateExpression);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass CombineExpressionVisitor : ExpressionVisitorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly ParameterExpression _parameterToReplace;Di2015NewLine    private readonly Expression _replacementExpression;Di2015NewLine    private CombineExpressionVisitor(ParameterExpression parameterToReplace, Expression replacementExpression)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _parameterToReplace = parameterToReplace;Di2015NewLine        _replacementExpression = replacementExpression;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Expression<Func<TSource, TResult>> Combine<TSource, TMember, TResult>(Di2015NewLine        Expression<Func<TSource, TMember>> memberSelector,Di2015NewLine        Expression<Func<TMember, TResult>> resultSelector)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine         var visitor = new CombineExpressionVisitor(Di2015NewLine            resultSelector.Parameters[0],Di2015NewLine            memberSelector.Body);Di2015NewLine        return Expression.Lambda<Func<TSource, TResult>>(Di2015NewLine            visitor.Visit(resultSelector.Body),Di2015NewLine            memberSelector.Parameters);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override Expression VisitParameter(ParameterExpression parameter)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (parameter == _parameterToReplace)Di2015NewLine            return _replacementExpression;Di2015NewLine        return base.VisitParameter(parameter);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5366791Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic abstract class LongTaskController: Controller,IHasLongTaskDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private bool _hasLongTask;Di2015NewLine    public bool HasLongTask { get { return _hasLongTask; } }Di2015NewLine    public event EventHandler CompleteLongTask;Di2015NewLine    void IHasLongTask.DoLongTask(Action action) { DoLongTask(action); }Di2015NewLine    protected void DoLongTask(Action action)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _hasLongTask = true;Di2015NewLine        if (CompleteLongTask == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new NullReferenceException("Controller.CompleteLongTask cannot be null when Controller does a long running task.");Di2015NewLine            action += () => CompleteLongTask(this, EventArgs.Empty);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        new Task(action).Start();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinepublic interface IHasLongTaskDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    bool HasLongTask { get; }Di2015NewLine    void DoLongTask(Action action);Di2015NewLine    event EventHandler CompleteLongTask;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5368399Di2015UniqueSeparator    class ConsoleLogger : System.IO.TextWriter {Di2015NewLine        private System.IO.TextWriter oldOut;Di2015NewLine        private Queue<string> log = new Queue<string>();Di2015NewLine        private StringBuilder line = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine        private object locker = new object();Di2015NewLine        private int newline;Di2015NewLine        private int logmax;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public ConsoleLogger(int history) {Di2015NewLine            logmax = history;Di2015NewLine            oldOut = Console.Out;Di2015NewLine            Console.SetOut(this);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        public override Encoding Encoding {Di2015NewLine            get { return oldOut.Encoding; }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        public override void Write(char value) {Di2015NewLine            oldOut.Write(value);Di2015NewLine            lock (locker) {Di2015NewLine                if (value == '\\r') newline++;Di2015NewLine                else if (value == '\\n') {Di2015NewLine                    log.Enqueue(line.ToString());Di2015NewLine                    if (log.Count > logmax) log.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine                    line.Length = newline = 0;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                else {Di2015NewLine                    for (; newline > 0; newline--) line.Append('\\r');Di2015NewLine                    line.Append(value);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

5368552Di2015UniqueSeparator private void readData() {Di2015NewLine            ///read all the data into memory (if you can)Di2015NewLine            string[] _data = File.ReadAllLines(inputDataFile);Di2015NewLine            Queue<String> _lines = new Queue<string>();Di2015NewLine            foreach (string _line in _data) {Di2015NewLine                _lines.Enqueue(_line.Trim()); //put it into a queue for convienceDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            ///iterate through the data and extract the details based on Di2015NewLine            ///known record delimiters.Di2015NewLine            while (_lines.Count > 0) {Di2015NewLine                Customer _customer = new Customer(Di2015NewLine                    _lines.Dequeue(),Di2015NewLine                    _lines.Dequeue(),Di2015NewLine                    _lines.Dequeue(),Di2015NewLine                    _lines.Dequeue(),Di2015NewLine                    _lines.Dequeue(),Di2015NewLine                    _lines.Dequeue(),Di2015NewLine                    _lines.Dequeue(),Di2015NewLine                    _lines.Dequeue(),Di2015NewLine                    _lines.Dequeue(),Di2015NewLine                    _lines.Dequeue(),Di2015NewLine                    _lines.Dequeue(),Di2015NewLine                    _lines.Dequeue(),Di2015NewLine                    _lines.Dequeue(),Di2015NewLine                    _lines.Dequeue());Di2015NewLine                int _numberOfAccounts = _customer.getNumberAccounts();Di2015NewLine                for (int i = 1; i <= _numberOfAccounts; i++) {Di2015NewLine                    Account _account = new Account(Di2015NewLine                        _lines.Dequeue(),Di2015NewLine                        _lines.Dequeue(),Di2015NewLine                        _lines.Dequeue(),Di2015NewLine                        _lines.Dequeue(),Di2015NewLine                        _lines.Dequeue(),Di2015NewLine                        _lines.Dequeue(),Di2015NewLine                        _lines.Dequeue());Di2015NewLine                    int _numberOfTransactions = _account.getAccNumTrans();Di2015NewLine                    for (int j = 1; j <= _numberOfTransactions; j++) {Di2015NewLine                        Transaction _transaction = new Transaction(Di2015NewLine                            _lines.Dequeue(),Di2015NewLine                            _lines.Dequeue(),Di2015NewLine                            _lines.Dequeue(),Di2015NewLine                            _lines.Dequeue(),Di2015NewLine                            _lines.Dequeue());Di2015NewLine                        _account.Transactions.Add(_transaction);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    _customer.Accounts.Add(_account);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                ///update the legacy part of the system.Di2015NewLine                bankDetails.Add(_customer);Di2015NewLine                foreach (Account _account in _customer.Accounts) {Di2015NewLine                    accDetails.Add(_account);Di2015NewLine                    foreach (Transaction _transaction in _account.Transactions) {Di2015NewLine                        tranDetails.Add(_transaction);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

5375215Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static HtmlNode RemoveChild(HtmlNode parent, HtmlNode oldChild, bool keepGrandChildren)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (oldChild == null)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("oldChild");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (oldChild.HasChildNodes && keepGrandChildren)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        HtmlNode prev = oldChild.PreviousSibling;Di2015NewLine        List<HtmlNode> nodes = new List<HtmlNode>(oldChild.ChildNodes.Cast<HtmlNode>());Di2015NewLine        nodes.Sort(new StreamPositionComparer());Di2015NewLine        foreach (HtmlNode grandchild in nodes)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            parent.InsertAfter(grandchild, prev);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    parent.RemoveChild(oldChild);Di2015NewLine    return oldChild;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// this helper class allows to sort nodes using their position in the file.Di2015NewLineprivate class StreamPositionComparer : IComparer<HtmlNode>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int IComparer<HtmlNode>.Compare(HtmlNode x, HtmlNode y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return y.StreamPosition.CompareTo(x.StreamPosition);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5375426Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void Swap2DRows(Array a, int indexOne, int indexTwo) {Di2015NewLine  if (a == null} { throw new ArgumentNullException("a"); }Di2015NewLine  if (a.Rank != 2) { throw new InvalidOperationException("..."); }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Only support zero based:Di2015NewLine  if (a.GetLowerBound(0) != 0) { throw new InvalidOperationException("..."); }Di2015NewLine  if (a.GetLowerBound(1) != 0) { throw new InvalidOperationException("..."); }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  if (indexOne >= a.GetUpperBound(0)) { throw new InvalidOperationException("..."); }Di2015NewLine  if (indexTwo >= a.GetUpperBound(0)) { throw new InvalidOperationException("..."); }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  for (int i = 0; i <= a.GetUpperBound(1); ++i) {Di2015NewLine    var t = a[indexOne, i];Di2015NewLine    a[indexOne, i] = a[indexTwo, i];Di2015NewLine    a[indexTwo, i] = t;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5379948Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<T> MergeWithRatio<T>(this IEnumerable<T> source, IEnumerable<T> mergeSequence, int ratio)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int currentRatio  = 1;Di2015NewLine    bool mergeSequenceIsEmpty = !mergeSequence.Any();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using (var mergeEnumerator = mergeSequence.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (var item in source)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return item;Di2015NewLine            currentRatio++;Di2015NewLine            if (currentRatio == ratio &&  !mergeSequenceIsEmpty)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (!mergeEnumerator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    mergeEnumerator.Reset();Di2015NewLine                    mergeEnumerator.MoveNext();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                yield return mergeEnumerator.Current;Di2015NewLine                currentRatio = 1;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5380495Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class MenuScreen {Di2015NewLine    // the common pattern for events is method which can event raiseDi2015NewLine    // the event-raising methods should have prefix "On-"Di2015NewLine    protected internal virtual void OnEntrySelected( EventArgs e ) {Di2015NewLine        // delegates are immutable, so variable "handler" will not be changedDi2015NewLine        var handler = this.EntrySelected;Di2015NewLine        // check for null. null handler can not be raisedDi2015NewLine        if ( null != handler ) {Di2015NewLine            // raise handlerDi2015NewLine            handler(this, e);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // the common pattern for event handler are arguments "sender" and "args".Di2015NewLine    // the public members should start with upper caseDi2015NewLine    // the common pattern for events "something happend" is suffix "-ed"Di2015NewLine    public event EventHandler EntrySelected;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class MenuEntry {Di2015NewLine    public void Draw(MenuScreen screen, Vector2 position) {Di2015NewLine        // ... some code ...Di2015NewLine        screen.OnEntrySelected( EventArgs.Empty );Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5381986Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static void recurseAndPrintProperties(Object ObjectToRecurse) {Di2015NewLine   foreach (PropertyInfo pi in ObjectToRecurse.GetType().GetProperties()) {Di2015NewLine       if ((pi.PropertyType.IsGenericType && pi.PropertyType.GetGenericTypeDefinition() == typeof(EntityCollection<>))) {Di2015NewLine           IEnumerable collection = (IEnumerable)pi.GetValue(ObjectToRecurse, null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine           foreach (object val in collection)Di2015NewLine               recurseAndPrintProperties(val);Di2015NewLine       } else {Di2015NewLine            if (pi.PropertyType == typeof(Descendant)) {Di2015NewLine                Descendant actualDescendant = (Descendant)pi.GetValue(ObjectToRecurse, null);Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(actualDescendant.idDescendant + " - " + actualDescendant.Name);Di2015NewLine            } elseDi2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(pi.Name + "  -  " + pi.GetValue(ObjectToRecurse, null));Di2015NewLine       }Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
5381986Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static T CloneEntity<T>(T Obj) where T : EntityObject, new() {Di2015NewLine        T Clone = new T();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Type typeToClone = Obj.GetType();Di2015NewLine        Type[] BadGenericTypes = new Type[] { typeof(EntityCollection<>), typeof(EntityReference<>) };Di2015NewLine        Type[] BadTypes = new Type[] { typeof(System.Data.EntityKey) };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (PropertyInfo pi in typeToClone.GetProperties().Where(p => p.CanWrite)) {Di2015NewLine            if (pi.PropertyType.IsGenericType && BadGenericTypes.Contains(pi.PropertyType.GetGenericTypeDefinition())Di2015NewLine                || (BadTypes.Contains(pi.PropertyType))Di2015NewLine                || (pi.Name.Equals(Extension.GetPropertyName(() => new FMVHistory().FMVHistoryId), StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase)))Di2015NewLine                continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            pi.SetValue(Clone, pi.GetValue(Obj, null), null);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return Clone;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

5382893Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass PersonDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public int Id { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine    public string NameHash { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine    public string Name { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Person(int id, string nameHash, string name)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Id = id;Di2015NewLine        NameHash = nameHash;Di2015NewLine        Name = name;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass People : IEnumerable<Person>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private Dictionary<int, Person> personDictionary = new Dictionary<int, Person>();Di2015NewLine    private Dictionary<string, int> hashIdMap = new Dictionary<string, int>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Add(Person person)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (person == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("person");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (personDictionary.ContainsKey(person.Id))Di2015NewLine            throw new InvalidOperationException("person Id is already referenced in collection.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (hashIdMap.ContainsKey(person.NameHash))Di2015NewLine            throw new InvalidOperationException("person NameHash is already referenced in collection.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        personDictionary.Add(person.Id, person);Di2015NewLine        hashIdMap.Add(person.NameHash, person.Id);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Person this[int id]Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!personDictionary.ContainsKey(id))Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("Id is not in the collection.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return personDictionary[id];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Person this[string nameHash]Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!hashIdMap.ContainsKey(nameHash))Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("NameHash is not in the collection.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return this[hashIdMap[nameHash]];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IEnumerator<Person> GetEnumerator()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (KeyValuePair<int, Person> pair in personDictionary)Di2015NewLine            yield return pair.Value;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    IEnumerator IEnumerable.GetEnumerator()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return this.GetEnumerator();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
5382893Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Person personA = new Person(1, "A", "Apple");Di2015NewLine    Person personB = new Person(2, "B", "Banana");Di2015NewLine    Person personC = new Person(3, "C", "Cherry");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    People people = new People();Di2015NewLine    people.Add(personA);Di2015NewLine    people.Add(personB);Di2015NewLine    people.Add(personC);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Person foo = people[1];Di2015NewLine    Person bar = people["C"];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Debug.Assert(foo.Name == "Apple");Di2015NewLine    Debug.Assert(bar.Name == "Cherry");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (Person person in people)Di2015NewLine        Debug.WriteLine(person.Name);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5383315Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static void CreateThumbnail(string[] b, double wid, double hght, bool Isprint)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string saveAt = "D:\\\\check";Di2015NewLine    foreach (string path in b)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var directory = new DirectoryInfo(path);Di2015NewLine        string outputPath = Path.Combine(saveAt, directory.Name);Di2015NewLine        foreach (FileInfo f in directory.GetFiles("*.*", SearchOption.AllDirectories))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (f.DirectoryName != directory.FullName)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                outputPath = Path.Combine(saveAt, directory.Name, f.Directory.Name);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (!Directory.Exists(outputPath))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Directory.CreateDirectory(outputPath);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            using (Image imagesize = Image.FromFile(f.FullName))Di2015NewLine            using (Bitmap bitmapNew = new Bitmap(imagesize))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                double maxWidth = wid;Di2015NewLine                double maxHeight = hght;Di2015NewLine                int w = imagesize.Width;Di2015NewLine                int h = imagesize.Height;Di2015NewLine                // Longest and shortest dimension Di2015NewLine                int longestDimension = (w > h) ? w : h;Di2015NewLine                int shortestDimension = (w < h) ? w : h;Di2015NewLine                // propotionality  Di2015NewLine                float factor = ((float)longestDimension) / shortestDimension;Di2015NewLine                // default width is greater than height    Di2015NewLine                double newWidth = maxWidth;Di2015NewLine                double newHeight = maxWidth / factor;Di2015NewLine                // if height greater than width recalculate  Di2015NewLine                if (w < h)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    newWidth = maxHeight / factor;Di2015NewLine                    newHeight = maxHeight;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                string fileName = Path.Combine(outputPath, Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(f.Name) + ".jpeg");Di2015NewLine                bitmapNew.GetThumbnailImage((int)newWidth, (int)newHeight, () => false, IntPtr.Zero)Di2015NewLine                    .Save(fileName, System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Jpeg);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5389911Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void DownloadAndProcessXml(string url, string userAgent, string outputFilePath)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (XmlTextWriter writer = new XmlTextWriter(outputFilePath, Encoding.UTF8))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        DownloadAndProcessXml(url, userAgent, writer);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static void DownloadAndProcessXml(string url, string userAgent, XmlWriter output)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    UserAgentXmlUrlResolver resolver = new UserAgentXmlUrlResolver(url, userAgent);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // WebClient is an easy to use class.Di2015NewLine    using (WebClient client = new WebClient())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // download Xml doc. set User-Agent header or the site won't answer us...Di2015NewLine        client.Headers[HttpRequestHeader.UserAgent] = resolver.UserAgent;Di2015NewLine        HtmlDocument xmlDoc = new HtmlDocument();Di2015NewLine        xmlDoc.Load(client.OpenRead(url));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // determine xslt (note the xpath trick as Html Agility Pack does not support xml processing instructions)Di2015NewLine        string xsltUrl = xmlDoc.DocumentNode.SelectSingleNode("//*[name()='?xml-stylesheet']").GetAttributeValue("href", null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // download Xslt docDi2015NewLine        client.Headers[HttpRequestHeader.UserAgent] = resolver.UserAgent;Di2015NewLine        XslCompiledTransform xslt = new XslCompiledTransform();Di2015NewLine        xslt.Load(new XmlTextReader(client.OpenRead(url + xsltUrl)), new XsltSettings(true, false), null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // transform Html/Xml doc into new Xml doc, easy as HtmlDocument implements IXPathNavigableDi2015NewLine        // note the use of a custom resolver to overcome this Xslt resolve requestsDi2015NewLine        xslt.Transform(xmlDoc, null, output, resolver);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// This class is needed during transformation otherwise there are errors.Di2015NewLine// This is probably due to this very specific Xslt file that needs to go back to the root document itself.Di2015NewLinepublic class UserAgentXmlUrlResolver : XmlUrlResolverDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public UserAgentXmlUrlResolver(string rootUrl, string userAgent)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        RootUrl = rootUrl;Di2015NewLine        UserAgent = userAgent;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string RootUrl { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public string UserAgent { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override object GetEntity(Uri absoluteUri, string role, Type ofObjectToReturn)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        WebClient client = new WebClient();Di2015NewLine        if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(UserAgent))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            client.Headers[HttpRequestHeader.UserAgent] = UserAgent;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return client.OpenRead(absoluteUri);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override Uri ResolveUri(Uri baseUri, string relativeUri)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if ((relativeUri == "/") && (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(RootUrl)))Di2015NewLine            return new Uri(RootUrl);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return base.ResolveUri(baseUri, relativeUri);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5391829Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic partial class Form1 : FormDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  public Form1()Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine     InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLine     ReadFile();Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private void ReadFile()Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine     // Assumes there are 3 columns (and 3 input values from the user)Di2015NewLine     string[] lines_in_file = File.ReadAllLines(@"C:\\Temp\\FixedWidth.txt");Di2015NewLine     foreach (string line in lines_in_file)Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine        int offset = 0;Di2015NewLine        int column_width = (int)ColumnWidth1NumericUpDown.Value;Di2015NewLine        // Set the color for the first columnDi2015NewLine        richTextBox1.SelectionColor = Color.Khaki;Di2015NewLine        richTextBox1.AppendText(line.Substring(offset, column_width));Di2015NewLine        offset += column_width;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        column_width = (int)ColumnWidth2NumericUpDown.Value;Di2015NewLine        // Set the color for the second columnDi2015NewLine        richTextBox1.SelectionColor = Color.HotPink;Di2015NewLine        richTextBox1.AppendText(line.Substring(offset, column_width));Di2015NewLine        offset += column_width;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        column_width = (int)ColumnWidth3NumericUpDown.Value;Di2015NewLine        // Make sure we dont try to substring incorrectlyDi2015NewLine        column_width = (line.Length - offset < column_width) ?Di2015NewLine            line.Length - offset : column_width; Di2015NewLine        // Set the color for the third columnDi2015NewLine        richTextBox1.SelectionColor = Color.MediumSeaGreen;Di2015NewLine        richTextBox1.AppendText(line.Substring(offset, column_width));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Add newlineDi2015NewLine        richTextBox1.AppendText(Environment.NewLine);Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5393361Di2015UniqueSeparatorCartesianProduct
5393361Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> CartesianProduct<T>(Di2015NewLine    this IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> sequences) Di2015NewLine{ Di2015NewLine  IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> emptyProduct = new[] { Enumerable.Empty<T>() }; Di2015NewLine  return sequences.Aggregate( Di2015NewLine    emptyProduct, Di2015NewLine    (accumulator, sequence) =>  Di2015NewLine      from accseq in accumulator  Di2015NewLine      from item in sequence  Di2015NewLine      select accseq.Concat(new[] {item}));                Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5393547Di2015UniqueSeparator// Obvious min is 1, obvious max is 99.Di2015NewLinefor(int i = 1; i != 100; ++i)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  // There's no point going beyond the lowest number that gives an answer higher than 100Di2015NewLine  int max = 100 * 100 - i * i;Di2015NewLine  // There's no point starting lower than our current first side, or we'll repeat results we already found.Di2015NewLine  for(int j = i; j * j <= max; ++j)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    // Find the square of the hypotenuseDi2015NewLine    int sqr = i * i + j * j;Di2015NewLine    // We could have a double and do hyp == Math.Round(hyp), but lets avoid rounding error-based false positives.Di2015NewLine    int hyp = (int)Math.Sqrt(sqr);Di2015NewLine    if(hyp * hyp == sqr)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      Console.WriteLine(i + ", " + j + ", " + hyp);Di2015NewLine      // If we want to e.g. have not just "3, 4, 5" but also "4, 3, 5", thenDi2015NewLine      // we can also here doDi2015NewLine      // Console.WriteLine(j + ", " + i + ", " + hyp);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5401777Di2015UniqueSeparatorCREATE FUNCTION dbo.F_SplitDi2015NewLine(Di2015NewLine@InputString VARCHAR(MAX)Di2015NewLine,@Separator VARCHAR(MAX)Di2015NewLine)Di2015NewLineRETURNS @ValueTable TABLE (Value VARCHAR(MAX))Di2015NewLineASDi2015NewLineBEGINDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    DECLARE @SeparatorIndex INT, @TotalLength INT, @StartIndex INT, @Value VARCHAR(MAX)Di2015NewLine    SET @TotalLength=LEN(@InputString)Di2015NewLine    SET @StartIndex = 1Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    IF @Separator IS NULL RETURNDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    WHILE @StartIndex <= @TotalLengthDi2015NewLine    BEGINDi2015NewLine        SET @SeparatorIndex = CHARINDEX(@Separator, @InputString, @StartIndex)Di2015NewLine        IF @SeparatorIndex > 0Di2015NewLine        BEGINDi2015NewLine            SET @Value = SUBSTRING(@InputString, @StartIndex, @SeparatorIndex-@StartIndex)Di2015NewLine            SET @StartIndex = @SeparatorIndex + 1Di2015NewLine        ENDDi2015NewLine        ELSEDi2015NewLine        BEGINDi2015NewLine            Set @Value = SUBSTRING(@InputString, @StartIndex, @TotalLength-@StartIndex+1)Di2015NewLine            SET @StartIndex = @TotalLength+1Di2015NewLine        ENDDi2015NewLine        INSERT INTO @ValueTableDi2015NewLine        (Value)Di2015NewLine        VALUESDi2015NewLine        (@Value)Di2015NewLine    ENDDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    RETURNDi2015NewLineENDDi2015NewLine

5402376Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static unsafe uint[] Test (uint[] firstParam, uint[] secondParam)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    uint[] Result = new uint[firstParam.Length + secondParam.Length];Di2015NewLine    fixed (uint * first = firstParam, second = secondParam, res = Result)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int IndTmp = 0; IndTmp < firstParam.Length; IndTmp++)Di2015NewLine            *(res + IndTmp) = *(first + IndTmp);Di2015NewLine        res += firstParam.Length;Di2015NewLine        for (int IndTmp = 0; IndTmp < secondParam.Length; IndTmp++)Di2015NewLine            *(res + IndTmp) = *(second + IndTmp++);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return Result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

0x80)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            status = MembershipCreateStatus.InvalidAnswer;Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        str3 = passwordAnswer;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (!SecUtility.ValidateParameter(ref str3, this.RequiresQuestionAndAnswer, true, false, 0x80))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        status = MembershipCreateStatus.InvalidQuestion;Di2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if ((providerUserKey != null) && !(providerUserKey is Guid))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        status = MembershipCreateStatus.InvalidProviderUserKey;Di2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (password.Length < this.MinRequiredPasswordLength)Di2015NewLine 5417174Di2015UniqueSeparator        using (SqlDataReader dsReader = cmd.ExecuteReader())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            XElement result = new XElement("root");Di2015NewLine            while (dsReader.Read())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Read sourceDi2015NewLine                XDocument srcDoc = XDocument.Parse(dsReader["x"].ToString());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Construct result elementDi2015NewLine                foreach (XElement baseElement in srcDoc.Descendants("root").Elements())Di2015NewLine                    if (result.Element(baseElement.Name) == null)   // skip already added nodesDi2015NewLine                        result.Add(new XElement(baseElement.Name, baseElement.Value));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            // Construct result string from sub-elements (to avoid "<root>..</root>" in output)Di2015NewLine            string str = "";Di2015NewLine            foreach (XElement element in result.Elements())Di2015NewLine                str += element.ToString();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // send the resultDi2015NewLine            SqlContext.Pipe.Send("start:" + str);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

5417371Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate WatchedVariable<string> state;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic void WaitForBlob()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  string value = state.Value;Di2015NewLine  while (value != "Blob")Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    value = state.WaitForChange(value);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
5417371Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class WatchedVariable<T>Di2015NewLine    where T : classDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private volatile T value;Di2015NewLine    private object valueLock = new object();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public T ValueDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return value; }Di2015NewLine        setDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            lock (valueLock)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                this.value = value;Di2015NewLine                Monitor.PulseAll(valueLock);  // all waiting threads will resume once we release valueLockDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public T WaitForChange(T fromValue)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (valueLock)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            while (true)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                T nextValue = value;Di2015NewLine                if (nextValue != fromValue) return nextValue;  // no race condition here: PulseAll can only be reached once we hit Wait()Di2015NewLine                Monitor.Wait(valueLock);  // wait for a changed pulseDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public WatchedVariable(T initValue)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        value = initValue;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5418648Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void MySimpleServer(string address, int port) Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    try Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        byte[] bufferBytes = new byte[32];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if(address.Equals("0.0.0.0")) {Di2015NewLine            udpSocket.Bind(new IPEndPoint(IPAddress.Any, port));Di2015NewLine        } else {Di2015NewLine            udpSocket.Bind(new IPEndPoint(IPAddress.Parse(address), port));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        remoteEndPoint = new IPEndPoint(IPAddress.Any, 0);Di2015NewLine        while (serverCanRun)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int numBytesReceived = udpSocket.ReceiveFrom(bufferBytes, ref remoteEndPoint);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // just means that one of the clients closed the connection using Shutdown.Di2015NewLine            // doesnt mean that we cant continue to receive.Di2015NewLine            if(numBytesReceived == 0)Di2015NewLine                continue; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // same here, loop to receive from another client.Di2015NewLine            Packet syncPacket = new Packet(bufferBytes);Di2015NewLine            if (syncPacket.PacketType != PacketType.Control)Di2015NewLine                continue; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            HandlePacket(packet, endPoint);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    } catch {Di2015NewLine        if(udpSocket != null) {Di2015NewLine            udpSocket.Close();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5419780Di2015UniqueSeparator// WorkItem implicitly inherits from the Object class.Di2015NewLinepublic class WorkItemDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Static field currentID stores the job ID of the last WorkItem thatDi2015NewLine    // has been created.Di2015NewLine    private static int currentID;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Properties.Di2015NewLine    protected int ID { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    protected string Title { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    protected string Description { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    protected TimeSpan jobLength { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Default constructor. If a derived class does not invoke a base-Di2015NewLine    // class constructor explicitly, the default constructor is calledDi2015NewLine    // implicitly. Di2015NewLine    public WorkItem()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ID = 0;Di2015NewLine        Title = "Default title";Di2015NewLine        Description = "Default description.";Di2015NewLine        jobLength = new TimeSpan();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Instance constructor that has three parameters.Di2015NewLine    public WorkItem(string title, string desc, TimeSpan joblen)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.ID = GetNextID();Di2015NewLine        this.Title = title;Di2015NewLine        this.Description = desc;Di2015NewLine        this.jobLength = joblen;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Static constructor to initialize the static member, currentID. ThisDi2015NewLine    // constructor is called one time, automatically, before any instanceDi2015NewLine    // of WorkItem or ChangeRequest is created, or currentID is referenced.Di2015NewLine    static WorkItem()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        currentID = 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected int GetNextID()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // currentID is a static field. It is incremented each time a newDi2015NewLine        // instance of WorkItem is created.Di2015NewLine        return ++currentID;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Method Update enables you to update the title and job length of anDi2015NewLine    // existing WorkItem object.Di2015NewLine    public void Update(string title, TimeSpan joblen)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.Title = title;Di2015NewLine        this.jobLength = joblen;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Virtual method override of the ToString method that is inheritedDi2015NewLine    // from System.Object.Di2015NewLine    public override string ToString()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return String.Format("{0} - {1}", this.ID, this.Title);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// ChangeRequest derives from WorkItem and adds a property (originalItemID) Di2015NewLine// and two constructors.Di2015NewLinepublic class ChangeRequest : WorkItemDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    protected int originalItemID { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Constructors. Because neither constructor calls a base-class Di2015NewLine    // constructor explicitly, the default constructor in the base classDi2015NewLine    // is called implicitly. The base class must contain a default Di2015NewLine    // constructor.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Default constructor for the derived class.Di2015NewLine    public ChangeRequest() { }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Instance constructor that has four parameters.Di2015NewLine    public ChangeRequest(string title, string desc, TimeSpan jobLen,Di2015NewLine                         int originalID)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // The following properties and the GetNexID method are inherited Di2015NewLine        // from WorkItem.Di2015NewLine        this.ID = GetNextID();Di2015NewLine        this.Title = title;Di2015NewLine        this.Description = desc;Di2015NewLine        this.jobLength = jobLen;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Property originalItemId is a member of ChangeRequest, but not Di2015NewLine        // of WorkItem.Di2015NewLine        this.originalItemID = originalID;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Create an instance of WorkItem by using the constructor in the Di2015NewLine        // base class that takes three arguments.Di2015NewLine        WorkItem item = new WorkItem("Fix Bugs",Di2015NewLine                                     "Fix all bugs in my code branch",Di2015NewLine                                     new TimeSpan(3, 4, 0, 0));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Create an instance of ChangeRequest by using the constructor inDi2015NewLine        // the derived class that takes four arguments.Di2015NewLine        ChangeRequest change = new ChangeRequest("Change Base Class Design",Di2015NewLine                                                 "Add members to the class",Di2015NewLine                                                 new TimeSpan(4, 0, 0),Di2015NewLine                                                 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Use the ToString method defined in WorkItem.Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(item.ToString());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Use the inherited Update method to change the title of the Di2015NewLine        // ChangeRequest object.Di2015NewLine        change.Update("Change the Design of the Base Class",Di2015NewLine            new TimeSpan(4, 0, 0));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // ChangeRequest inherits WorkItem's override of ToString.Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(change.ToString());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Keep the console open in debug mode.Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Press any key to exit.");Di2015NewLine        Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine/* Output:Di2015NewLine    1 - Fix BugsDi2015NewLine    2 - Change the Design of the Base ClassDi2015NewLine*/Di2015NewLine

5420228Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static object GetSubjectHierarchyJSON(Func<vwHierarchicalSubject, bool> InitialPredicate, HierarchicalSubjectDAO DAO, int ItemType) {Di2015NewLine        List<LINQLayer.vwHierarchicalSubject> TempSource = DAO.GetAll(DAO.UserID, ItemType).Di2015NewLine            OrderBy(V => V.ParentSubjectName).ThenBy(V => V.LevelNumber).ThenBy(V => V.SubjectName).ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var result = new List<object>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (vwHierarchicalSubject V in TempSource.Where(InitialPredicate).OrderBy(v => v.SubjectName))Di2015NewLine            result.Add(BuildJSON(V, TempSource));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static object BuildJSON(vwHierarchicalSubject V, List<vwHierarchicalSubject> TempSource) {Di2015NewLine        IEnumerable<vwHierarchicalSubject> Children =Di2015NewLine            TempSource.Where(x => x.ParentID.HasValue && x.ParentID.Value == V.id).OrderBy(v => v.SubjectName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int id = V.id;Di2015NewLine        string subText = V.SubjectName.Replace("&", "&");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (Children.Count() == 0)Di2015NewLine            return new { id = V.id, text = subText, children = new List<object>(), expanded = true };Di2015NewLine        else {Di2015NewLine            var result = new { id = V.id, text = subText, children = new List<object>() };Di2015NewLine            foreach (vwHierarchicalSubject vElement in Children)Di2015NewLine                result.children.Add(BuildJSON(vElement, TempSource));Di2015NewLine            return result;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

a);Di2015NewLine    return a.ToString() + "...";Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class TestClassDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public int SomeMethod(int a, DateTime? xyz)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      if(xyz != null)Di2015NewLine            a+= xyz.GetValueOrDefault().Day;Di2015NewLine        return 12 + a;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevoid Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var methodInfo = typeof(UserQuery).GetMethod("TestMethod1");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    dynamic instance = CreateWrapper(methodInfo, sb);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    instance.a = 11;Di2015NewLine    instance.X = 2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    instance.CallMethod();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /*Di2015NewLine    var methodInfo = typeof(TestClass).GetMethod("SomeMethod");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    dynamic instance = CreateWrapper(methodInfo, sb);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    instance.a = 11;Di2015NewLine    instance.xyz = new DateTime(2010, 1, 2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    instance.CallMethod(new TestClass());Di2015NewLine*/Di2015NewLine    ((Object)instance).Dump();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    sb.ToString().Dump();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic object CreateWrapper(MethodInfo methodInfo, StringBuilder sb)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  // pick either C#, VB or another language that can handle genericsDi2015NewLine    var codeDom = CodeDomProvider.CreateProvider("C#");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var unit = new CodeCompileUnit();Di2015NewLine    var codeNameSpace = new CodeNamespace();Di2015NewLine    codeNameSpace.Name = "YourNamespace";Di2015NewLine    var wrapperType = AddWrapperType(codeDom, codeNameSpace, methodInfo, "WrapperType",     "MethodResultValue");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    unit.Namespaces.Add(codeNameSpace);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // this is only needed so that LinqPad can dump the codeDi2015NewLine    codeDom.GenerateCodeFromNamespace(codeNameSpace, new StringWriter(sb), new CodeGeneratorOptions());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // put the temp assembly in LinqPad's temp folderDi2015NewLine    var outputFileName = Path.Combine(Path.GetDirectoryName(new Uri(typeof(UserQuery).Assembly.CodeBase).AbsolutePath), Di2015NewLine                                                                      Guid.NewGuid() + ".dll");Di2015NewLine    var results = codeDom.CompileAssemblyFromDom(new CompilerParameters(new[]{new Uri(methodInfo.DeclaringType.Assembly.CodeBase).AbsolutePath,Di2015NewLine                                                                              new Uri(typeof(UserQuery).Assembly.CodeBase).AbsolutePath,Di2015NewLine                                                                              new Uri(typeof(UserQuery).BaseType.Assembly.CodeBase).AbsolutePath}.Distinct().ToArray(),Di2015NewLine                                                                                                                                                        outputFileName), Di2015NewLine                                                                                             unit);Di2015NewLine    results.Errors.Dump();Di2015NewLine    new Uri(results.CompiledAssembly.CodeBase).AbsolutePath.Dump();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if(results.Errors.Count == 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var compiledType = results.CompiledAssembly.GetType(codeNameSpace.Name + "." + wrapperType.Name);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return Activator.CreateInstance(compiledType);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return null;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic CodeTypeDeclaration AddWrapperType(CodeDomProvider codeDom, Di2015NewLine                                          CodeNamespace codeNameSpace, Di2015NewLine                                                                                    MethodInfo methodInfo, Di2015NewLine                                                                                    string typeName, Di2015NewLine                                                                                    string resultPropertyName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var parameters = (from parameter in methodInfo.GetParameters()Di2015NewLine                      select parameter).ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var returnValue = methodInfo.ReturnType;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if(!String.IsNullOrEmpty(methodInfo.DeclaringType.Namespace))Di2015NewLine        codeNameSpace.Imports.Add(new CodeNamespaceImport(methodInfo.DeclaringType.Namespace));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var wrapperType = new CodeTypeDeclaration(typeName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var defaultAttributes = MemberAttributes.Public | MemberAttributes.Final;Di2015NewLine    var thisRef = new CodeThisReferenceExpression();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Func<Type, Type> getRealType = t => t.IsByRef || t.IsPointer ? t.GetElementType(): t;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Func<String, String> getFieldName = parameterName => "m_" + parameterName + "_Field";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Action<ParameterInfo> addProperty = p =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var realType = getRealType(p.ParameterType);Di2015NewLine        var usedName = p.Position == -1 ? resultPropertyName : p.Name;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        wrapperType.Members.Add(new CodeMemberFieldDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Name = getFieldName(usedName),Di2015NewLine            Type = new CodeTypeReference(realType),Di2015NewLine            Attributes= MemberAttributes.PrivateDi2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var property = new CodeMemberPropertyDi2015NewLine                                        {Di2015NewLine                                            Name = usedName,Di2015NewLine                                            Type = new CodeTypeReference(realType),Di2015NewLine                                          Attributes= defaultAttributesDi2015NewLine                                        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        property.GetStatements.Add(new CodeMethodReturnStatement(new CodeFieldReferenceExpression(thisRef,  Di2015NewLine                                                                                                  getFieldName(usedName))));Di2015NewLine        property.SetStatements.Add(new CodeAssignStatement(new CodeFieldReferenceExpression(thisRef,  getFieldName(usedName)), Di2015NewLine                                                           new CodeArgumentReferenceExpression("value")));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        wrapperType.Members.Add(property);Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    parameters.ForEach(addProperty);Di2015NewLine    if(methodInfo.ReturnParameter != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        addProperty(methodInfo.ReturnParameter);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var callMethod = new CodeMemberMethodDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Name="CallMethod", Di2015NewLine        Attributes=defaultAttributesDi2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    CodeMethodInvokeExpression invokeExpr;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if(!methodInfo.IsStatic)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        callMethod.Parameters.Add(new CodeParameterDeclarationExpression(methodInfo.DeclaringType, Di2015NewLine                                                                         "instance"));Di2015NewLine        invokeExpr = new CodeMethodInvokeExpression(new CodeArgumentReferenceExpression("instance"),Di2015NewLine                                                    methodInfo.Name);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine        invokeExpr = new CodeMethodInvokeExpression(new CodeTypeReferenceExpression(methodInfo.DeclaringType), methodInfo.Name);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach(var parameter in parameters)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        CodeExpression fieldExpression = new CodeFieldReferenceExpression(thisRef, Di2015NewLine                                                                          getFieldName(parameter.Name));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if(parameter.ParameterType.IsByRef && !parameter.IsOut)Di2015NewLine            fieldExpression = new CodeDirectionExpression(FieldDirection.Ref, fieldExpression);Di2015NewLine        else if(parameter.IsOut)Di2015NewLine            fieldExpression = new CodeDirectionExpression(FieldDirection.Out, fieldExpression);Di2015NewLine        else if(parameter.IsIn)Di2015NewLine           fieldExpression = new CodeDirectionExpression(FieldDirection.In, fieldExpression);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        invokeExpr.Parameters.Add(fieldExpression);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    wrapperType.Members.Add(callMethod);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if(returnValue != typeof(void))Di2015NewLine        callMethod.Statements.Add(new CodeAssignStatement(new CodeFieldReferenceExpression(thisRef,Di2015NewLine                                                                                           getFieldName(resultPropertyName)),Di2015NewLine                                                                                                        invokeExpr));Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine        callMethod.Statements.Add(invokeExpr);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    codeNameSpace.Types.Add(wrapperType);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return wrapperType;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5421315Di2015UniqueSeparator    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Convenience method to parse a string as an enum typeDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public static T ParseEnum<T>(this string enumValue)Di2015NewLine        where T : struct, IConvertibleDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return EnumUtil<T>.Parse(enumValue);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Utility methods for enum values. This static type will fail to initialize Di2015NewLine/// (throwing a <see cref="TypeInitializationException"/>) ifDi2015NewLine/// you try to provide a value that is not an enum.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <typeparam name="T">An enum type. </typeparam>Di2015NewLinepublic static class EnumUtil<T>Di2015NewLine    where T : struct, IConvertible // Try to get as much of a static check as we can.Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // The .NET framework doesn't provide a compile-checkedDi2015NewLine    // way to ensure that a type is an enum, so we have to check when the typeDi2015NewLine    // is statically invoked.Di2015NewLine    static EnumUtil()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Throw Exception on static initialization if the given type isn't an enum.Di2015NewLine        Require.That(typeof (T).IsEnum, () => typeof(T).FullName + " is not an enum type.");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static T Parse(string enumValue)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var parsedValue = (T)System.Enum.Parse(typeof (T), enumValue);Di2015NewLine        //Require that the parsed value is definedDi2015NewLine        Require.That(parsedValue.IsDefined(), Di2015NewLine            () => new ArgumentException(string.Format("{0} is not a defined value for enum type {1}", Di2015NewLine                enumValue, typeof(T).FullName)));Di2015NewLine        return parsedValue;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static bool IsDefined(T enumValue)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return System.Enum.IsDefined(typeof (T), enumValue);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5423839Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate const int InitialStackSize = 500;    Di2015NewLineprivate Stack<String> undoStack = new Stack<String>(InitialStackSize);Di2015NewLineprivate Stack<String> redoStack = new Stack<String>(InitialStackSize); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void YourKeyPressEventHandler(...)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine        // The user pressed on CTRL - Z, execute an "Undo"Di2015NewLine        if (e.KeyChar == 26)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Save the cursor's positionDi2015NewLine            int selectionStartBackup = SelectionStart;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            redoStack.Push(Text);Di2015NewLine            Text = undoStack.Pop();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Restore the cursor's positionDi2015NewLine            SelectionStart = selectionStartBackup;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // The user pressed on CTRL - Y, execute a "Redo"Di2015NewLine        if (e.KeyChar == 25)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (redoStack.Count <= 0)Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Save the cursor's positionDi2015NewLine            int selectionStartBackup = SelectionStart + redoStack.ElementAt(redoStack.Count - 1).Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            undoStack.Push(Text);Di2015NewLine            Text = redoStack.Pop();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Restore the cursor's positionDi2015NewLine            SelectionStart = selectionStartBackup;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }    Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        undoStack.Push(Text);Di2015NewLine        SelectedText = e.KeyChar.ToString();  Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
