5424270Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Indicates that an enum value has a description.</summary>Di2015NewLine[AttributeUsage(AttributeTargets.Field)]Di2015NewLinepublic class DescriptionAttribute : System.AttributeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>The description for the enum value.</summary>Di2015NewLine    public string Description { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Constructs a new DescriptionAttribute.</summary>Di2015NewLine    public DescriptionAttribute() { }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Constructs a new DescriptionAttribute.</summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="description">The initial value of the Description property.</param>Di2015NewLine    public DescriptionAttribute(string description)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.Description = description;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Returns the Description property.</summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>The Description property.</returns>Di2015NewLine    public override string ToString()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return this.Description;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
5424270Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Indicates whether or not an enum must have a NameAttribute and a DescriptionAttribute.</summary>Di2015NewLine[AttributeUsage(AttributeTargets.Enum)]Di2015NewLinepublic class DescriptiveEnumEnforcementAttribute : System.AttributeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Defines the different types of enforcement for DescriptiveEnums.</summary>Di2015NewLine    public enum EnforcementTypeEnumDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        /// <summary>Indicates that the enum must have a NameAttribute and a DescriptionAttribute.</summary>Di2015NewLine        ThrowException,Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Indicates that the enum does not have a NameAttribute and a DescriptionAttribute, the value will be used instead.</summary>Di2015NewLine        DefaultToValueDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>The enforcement type for this DescriptiveEnumEnforcementAttribute.</summary>Di2015NewLine    public EnforcementTypeEnum EnforcementType { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Constructs a new DescriptiveEnumEnforcementAttribute.</summary>Di2015NewLine    public DescriptiveEnumEnforcementAttribute()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.EnforcementType = EnforcementTypeEnum.DefaultToValue;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Constructs a new DescriptiveEnumEnforcementAttribute.</summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="enforcementType">The initial value of the EnforcementType property.</param>Di2015NewLine    public DescriptiveEnumEnforcementAttribute(EnforcementTypeEnum enforcementType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.EnforcementType = enforcementType;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
5424270Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Provides functionality to enhance enumerations.</summary>Di2015NewLinepublic static partial class EnumUtilDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Returns the description of the specified enum.</summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="value">The value of the enum for which to return the description.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>A description of the enum, or the enum name if no description exists.</returns>Di2015NewLine    public static string GetDescription(this Enum value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return GetEnumDescription(value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Returns the description of the specified enum.</summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="value">The value of the enum for which to return the description.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>A description of the enum, or the enum name if no description exists.</returns>Di2015NewLine    public static string GetDescription<T>(object value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return GetEnumDescription(value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Returns the description of the specified enum.</summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="value">The value of the enum for which to return the description.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>A description of the enum, or the enum name if no description exists.</returns>Di2015NewLine    public static string GetEnumDescription(object value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (value == null)Di2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Type type = value.GetType();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Make sure the object is an enum.Di2015NewLine        if (!type.IsEnum)Di2015NewLine            throw new ApplicationException("Value parameter must be an enum.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        FieldInfo fieldInfo = type.GetField(value.ToString());Di2015NewLine        object[] descriptionAttributes = fieldInfo.GetCustomAttributes(typeof(DescriptionAttribute), false);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //If no DescriptionAttribute exists for this enum value, check the DescriptiveEnumEnforcementAttribute and decide how to proceed.Di2015NewLine        if (descriptionAttributes == null || descriptionAttributes.Length == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            object[] enforcementAttributes = fieldInfo.GetCustomAttributes(typeof(DescriptiveEnumEnforcementAttribute), false);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //If a DescriptiveEnumEnforcementAttribute exists, either throw an exception or return the name of the enum instead.Di2015NewLine            if (enforcementAttributes != null && enforcementAttributes.Length == 1)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                DescriptiveEnumEnforcementAttribute enforcementAttribute = (DescriptiveEnumEnforcementAttribute)enforcementAttributes[0];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (enforcementAttribute.EnforcementType == DescriptiveEnumEnforcementAttribute.EnforcementTypeEnum.ThrowException)Di2015NewLine                    throw new ApplicationException("No Description attributes exist in enforced enum of type '" + type.Name + "', value '" + value.ToString() + "'.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                return GetEnumName(value);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else //Just return the name of the enum.Di2015NewLine                return GetEnumName(value);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (descriptionAttributes.Length > 1)Di2015NewLine            throw new ApplicationException("Too many Description attributes exist in enum of type '" + type.Name + "', value '" + value.ToString() + "'.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Return the value of the DescriptionAttribute.Di2015NewLine        return descriptionAttributes[0].ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5429847Di2015UniqueSeparatordef numContains (number, digit):Di2015NewLine    if number == 0 and digit == 0:Di2015NewLine        return trueDi2015NewLine    while number != 0:Di2015NewLine        if number % 10 == digit:Di2015NewLine            return trueDi2015NewLine        number = number / 10Di2015NewLine    return falseDi2015NewLine

5429847Di2015UniqueSeparator// Function: containsDigit, returns whether non-negative number holds a digit.Di2015NewLine//       In: num, the integer to check.Di2015NewLine//           dgt, the digit to look for.Di2015NewLine//      Out: Boolean representing whether digit found in number.Di2015NewLine//    Notes: Digit is coerced to a single digit.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineBoolean containsDigit(UInt32 num, UInt32 dgt) {Di2015NewLine    dgt = dgt % 10;                // silently force contract compliance.Di2015NewLine    if ((num == 0) && (dgt == 0))  // Zero contains zero.Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    while (num != 0) {             // While more digits in number.Di2015NewLine        if ((num % 10) == dgt)     // Return true if rightmost digit matches.Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        num = num / 10;            // Get next digit into rightmost position.Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return false;                  // No matches, return false.Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5431309Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Expression<Func<T, bool>> AndAlso<T>(Di2015NewLine    Expression<Func<T, bool>> x, Expression<Func<T, bool>> y)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var newY = new ExpressionRewriter().Subst(y.Parameters[0], x.Parameters[0]).Inline().Apply(y.Body);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return Expression.Lambda<Func<T, bool>>(Di2015NewLine        Expression.AndAlso(x.Body, newY),Di2015NewLine        x.Parameters);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
5431309Di2015UniqueSeparatorExpressionVisitor
5431309Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ParameterVisitor : ExpressionVisitorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly ReadOnlyCollection<ParameterExpression> from, to;Di2015NewLine    public ParameterVisitor(Di2015NewLine        ReadOnlyCollection<ParameterExpression> from,Di2015NewLine        ReadOnlyCollection<ParameterExpression> to)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if(from == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("from");Di2015NewLine        if(to == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("to");Di2015NewLine        if(from.Count != to.Count) throw new InvalidOperationException(Di2015NewLine             "Parameter lengths must match");Di2015NewLine        this.from = from;Di2015NewLine        this.to = to;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    protected override Expression VisitParameter(ParameterExpression node)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < from.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (node == from[i]) return to[i];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return node;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinepublic static Expression<Func<T, bool>> AndAlso<T>(Di2015NewLine      Expression<Func<T, bool>> x, Expression<Func<T, bool>> y)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var newY = new ParameterVisitor(y.Parameters, x.Parameters)Di2015NewLine              .VisitAndConvert(y.Body, "AndAlso");Di2015NewLine    return Expression.Lambda<Func<T, bool>>(Di2015NewLine        Expression.AndAlso(x.Body, newY),Di2015NewLine        x.Parameters);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5439802Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static MvcHtmlString CanonicalUrl(this HtmlHelper html, string path)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(path))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var rawUrl = html.ViewContext.RequestContext.HttpContext.Request.Url;Di2015NewLine        path = String.Format("{0}://{1}{2}", rawUrl.Scheme, rawUrl.Host, rawUrl.AbsolutePath);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    path = path.ToLower();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (path.Count(c => c == '/') > 3)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        path = path.TrimEnd('/');Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (path.EndsWith("/index"))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        path = path.Substring(0, path.Length - 6);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var canonical = new TagBuilder("link");Di2015NewLine    canonical.MergeAttribute("rel", "canonical");Di2015NewLine    canonical.MergeAttribute("href", path);Di2015NewLine    return new MvcHtmlString(canonical.ToString(TagRenderMode.SelfClosing));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5442603Di2015UniqueSeparator// Provide a way to wait for the value to be read;Di2015NewLine// Initially, the variable can be set.Di2015NewLineprivate AutoResetEvent _event = new AutoResetEvent(true);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Make the field private so that it can't be changed outside the setter methodDi2015NewLineprivate static int _yourField;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static int YourField {Di2015NewLine    // "AutoResetEvent.Set" will release ALLthe threads blocked in the setter.Di2015NewLine    // I am not sure this is what you require though.Di2015NewLine    get { _event.Set(); return _yourField; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // "WaitOne" will block any calling thread before "get" has been called.Di2015NewLine    // except the first timeDi2015NewLine    // You'll have to check for deadlocks by yourselfDi2015NewLine    // You probably want to a timeout in the wait, in caseDi2015NewLine    set { _event.WaitOne(); _yourField = value; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5443690Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void Debug( string message )Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  message = string.Format( "{0}: {1}", GetCallingMethodInfo(), message );Di2015NewLine  // logging stuffDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Gets the application name and method that called the logger.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLineprivate static string GetCallingMethodInfo()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  // we should be looking at the stack 2 frames in the past:Di2015NewLine  // 1. for the calling method in this classDi2015NewLine  // 2. for the calling method that called the method in this classDi2015NewLine  MethodBase method = new StackFrame( 2 ).GetMethod();Di2015NewLine  string name = method.Name;Di2015NewLine  string type = method.DeclaringType.Name;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  return string.Format( "{0}.{1}", type, name );Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5447514Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static Expression<Func<TSource, bool>> CreatePropertyFilter<TSource>Di2015NewLine    (Expression<Func<TSource, string>> selector, Di2015NewLine     string value, Di2015NewLine     TextMatchMode matchMode)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Argument-checking here.    Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var body = selector.Body as MemberExpression;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (body == null)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException("Not a MemberExpression.");    Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // string.StartsWith / EndsWith etc. depending on the matchMode.Di2015NewLine    var method = typeof(string)Di2015NewLine                 .GetMethod(GetMethodName(matchMode), new[] { typeof(string) });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // input.Member.method(value)Di2015NewLine    var compEx = Expression.Call(body, method, Expression.Constant(value));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // We can reuse the parameter of the source.Di2015NewLine    return Expression.Lambda<Func<TSource, bool>>(compEx, selector.Parameters);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
5447514Di2015UniqueSeparator// I really don't like this enum.Di2015NewLine// Why not explicitly include Equals as a member?Di2015NewLineprivate static string GetMethodName(TextMatchMode mode)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    switch (mode)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        case TextMatchMode.StartsWith:Di2015NewLine            return "StartsWith";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        case TextMatchMode.EndsWith:Di2015NewLine                return "EndsWith";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        case TextMatchMode.Contains:Di2015NewLine            return "Contains";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        default:Di2015NewLine            return "Equals";Di2015NewLine    }    Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5447690Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class DiacriticStringComparer : IComparer<string>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static readonly HashSet<char> _Specials = new HashSet<char> { '', '', '', '' };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int Compare(string x, string y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // handle special cases first: x == null and/or y == null,  x.Equals(y)Di2015NewLine        ...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var lengthToCompare = Math.Min(x.Length, y.Length);Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < lengthToCompare; ++i)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var cx = x[i];Di2015NewLine            var cy = y[i];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (cx == cy) continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (_Specials.Contains(cx) || _Specials.Contains(cy))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // handle special diacritics comparisonDi2015NewLine                ...Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // cx must be unequal to cy -> can only be larger or smallerDi2015NewLine                return cx < cy ? -1 : 1;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // once we are here the strings are equal up to lengthToCompare charactersDi2015NewLine        // we have already dealt with the strings being equal so now one must be shorter than the otherDi2015NewLine        return x.Length < y.Length ? -1 : 1;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

set; }Di2015NewLine            public string[] stuff = {"lazy Cow Jumped Over", "The", "Moon"};Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public List<Nested> Items;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static class HelperDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public static string ToXml<T>(this T obj) where T:class, new()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (null==obj) return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            using (var mem = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var ser = new XmlSerializer(typeof(T));Di2015NewLine                ser.Serialize(mem, obj);Di2015NewLine                return System.Text.Encoding.UTF8.GetString(mem.ToArray());Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static T FromXml<T>(this string xml) where T: new()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            using (var mem = new MemoryStream(System.Text.Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(xml)))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var ser = new XmlSerializer(typeof(T));Di2015NewLine                return (T) ser.Deserialize(mem);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var data = new Data { Items = new List<Data.Nested> { new Data.Nested {The="1"} } };Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(data.ToXml());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var clone = data.ToXml().FromXml<Data>();Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Deserialized: {0}", !ReferenceEquals(data, clone));Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Identical: {0}", Equals(data.ToXml(), clone.ToXml()));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5454576Di2015UniqueSeparatorforeach_in.Rule = ToTerm("foreach") + "(" + variable + "in" + list_obj + ")" + block;Di2015NewLineforeach_as.Rule = ToTerm("foreach") + "(" + list_obj + "as" + variable + ")" + block;Di2015NewLinefor_loop.Rule = ToTerm("for") + "(" + simple_assignment + ";" + comparison + ";" + assignment + ")" + block;Di2015NewLineif_condition.Rule = ToTerm("if") + "(" + comparison + ")" + block;Di2015NewLineif_else.Rule = if_condition + PreferShiftHere() + "else" + block;Di2015NewLinepreset_directive.Rule = foreach_in | foreach_as | for_loop | if_else | if_condition;Di2015NewLinedirective_blk.Rule = preset_directive | custom_directive;Di2015NewLine

5454692Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ProtectionDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public string OpenSSLEncrypt(string plainText, string passphrase)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // generate saltDi2015NewLine            byte[] key, iv;Di2015NewLine            byte[] salt = new byte[8];Di2015NewLine            RNGCryptoServiceProvider rng = new RNGCryptoServiceProvider();Di2015NewLine            rng.GetNonZeroBytes(salt);Di2015NewLine            DeriveKeyAndIV(passphrase, salt, out key, out iv);Di2015NewLine            // encrypt bytesDi2015NewLine            byte[] encryptedBytes = EncryptStringToBytesAes(plainText, key, iv);Di2015NewLine            // add salt as first 8 bytesDi2015NewLine            byte[] encryptedBytesWithSalt = new byte[salt.Length + encryptedBytes.Length + 8];Di2015NewLine            Buffer.BlockCopy(Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes("Salted__"), 0, encryptedBytesWithSalt, 0, 8);Di2015NewLine            Buffer.BlockCopy(salt, 0, encryptedBytesWithSalt, 8, salt.Length);Di2015NewLine            Buffer.BlockCopy(encryptedBytes, 0, encryptedBytesWithSalt, salt.Length + 8, encryptedBytes.Length);Di2015NewLine            // base64 encodeDi2015NewLine            return Convert.ToBase64String(encryptedBytesWithSalt);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public string OpenSSLDecrypt(string encrypted, string passphrase)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // base 64 decodeDi2015NewLine            byte[] encryptedBytesWithSalt = Convert.FromBase64String(encrypted);Di2015NewLine            // extract salt (first 8 bytes of encrypted)Di2015NewLine            byte[] salt = new byte[8];Di2015NewLine            byte[] encryptedBytes = new byte[encryptedBytesWithSalt.Length - salt.Length - 8];Di2015NewLine            Buffer.BlockCopy(encryptedBytesWithSalt, 8, salt, 0, salt.Length);Di2015NewLine            Buffer.BlockCopy(encryptedBytesWithSalt, salt.Length + 8, encryptedBytes, 0, encryptedBytes.Length);Di2015NewLine            // get key and ivDi2015NewLine            byte[] key, iv;Di2015NewLine            DeriveKeyAndIV(passphrase, salt, out key, out iv);Di2015NewLine            return DecryptStringFromBytesAes(encryptedBytes, key, iv);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static void DeriveKeyAndIV(string passphrase, byte[] salt, out byte[] key, out byte[] iv)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // generate key and ivDi2015NewLine            List<byte> concatenatedHashes = new List<byte>(48);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            byte[] password = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(passphrase);Di2015NewLine            byte[] currentHash = new byte[0];Di2015NewLine            MD5 md5 = MD5.Create();Di2015NewLine            bool enoughBytesForKey = false;Di2015NewLine            // See http://www.openssl.org/docs/crypto/EVP_BytesToKey.html#KEY_DERIVATION_ALGORITHMDi2015NewLine            while (!enoughBytesForKey)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int preHashLength = currentHash.Length + password.Length + salt.Length;Di2015NewLine                byte[] preHash = new byte[preHashLength];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Buffer.BlockCopy(currentHash, 0, preHash, 0, currentHash.Length);Di2015NewLine                Buffer.BlockCopy(password, 0, preHash, currentHash.Length, password.Length);Di2015NewLine                Buffer.BlockCopy(salt, 0, preHash, currentHash.Length + password.Length, salt.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                currentHash = md5.ComputeHash(preHash);Di2015NewLine                concatenatedHashes.AddRange(currentHash);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (concatenatedHashes.Count >= 48)Di2015NewLine                    enoughBytesForKey = true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            key = new byte[32];Di2015NewLine            iv = new byte[16];Di2015NewLine            concatenatedHashes.CopyTo(0, key, 0, 32);Di2015NewLine            concatenatedHashes.CopyTo(32, iv, 0, 16);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            md5.Clear();Di2015NewLine            md5 = null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static byte[] EncryptStringToBytesAes(string plainText, byte[] key, byte[] iv)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Check arguments.Di2015NewLine            if (plainText == null || plainText.Length <= 0)Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentNullException("plainText");Di2015NewLine            if (key == null || key.Length <= 0)Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentNullException("key");Di2015NewLine            if (iv == null || iv.Length <= 0)Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentNullException("iv");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Declare the stream used to encrypt to an in memoryDi2015NewLine            // array of bytes.Di2015NewLine            MemoryStream msEncrypt;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Declare the RijndaelManaged objectDi2015NewLine            // used to encrypt the data.Di2015NewLine            RijndaelManaged aesAlg = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Create a RijndaelManaged objectDi2015NewLine                // with the specified key and IV.Di2015NewLine                aesAlg = new RijndaelManaged { Mode = CipherMode.CBC, KeySize = 256, BlockSize = 128, Key = key, IV = iv };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Create an encryptor to perform the stream transform.Di2015NewLine                ICryptoTransform encryptor = aesAlg.CreateEncryptor(aesAlg.Key, aesAlg.IV);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Create the streams used for encryption.Di2015NewLine                msEncrypt = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLine                using (CryptoStream csEncrypt = new CryptoStream(msEncrypt, encryptor, CryptoStreamMode.Write))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    using (StreamWriter swEncrypt = new StreamWriter(csEncrypt))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        //Write all data to the stream.Di2015NewLine                        swEncrypt.Write(plainText);Di2015NewLine                        swEncrypt.Flush();Di2015NewLine                        swEncrypt.Close();Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            finallyDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Clear the RijndaelManaged object.Di2015NewLine                if (aesAlg != null)Di2015NewLine                    aesAlg.Clear();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Return the encrypted bytes from the memory stream.Di2015NewLine            return msEncrypt.ToArray();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static string DecryptStringFromBytesAes(byte[] cipherText, byte[] key, byte[] iv)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Check arguments.Di2015NewLine            if (cipherText == null || cipherText.Length <= 0)Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentNullException("cipherText");Di2015NewLine            if (key == null || key.Length <= 0)Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentNullException("key");Di2015NewLine            if (iv == null || iv.Length <= 0)Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentNullException("iv");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Declare the RijndaelManaged objectDi2015NewLine            // used to decrypt the data.Di2015NewLine            RijndaelManaged aesAlg = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Declare the string used to holdDi2015NewLine            // the decrypted text.Di2015NewLine            string plaintext;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Create a RijndaelManaged objectDi2015NewLine                // with the specified key and IV.Di2015NewLine                aesAlg = new RijndaelManaged {Mode = CipherMode.CBC, KeySize = 256, BlockSize = 128, Key = key, IV = iv};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Create a decrytor to perform the stream transform.Di2015NewLine                ICryptoTransform decryptor = aesAlg.CreateDecryptor(aesAlg.Key, aesAlg.IV);Di2015NewLine                // Create the streams used for decryption.Di2015NewLine                using (MemoryStream msDecrypt = new MemoryStream(cipherText))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    using (CryptoStream csDecrypt = new CryptoStream(msDecrypt, decryptor, CryptoStreamMode.Read))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        using (StreamReader srDecrypt = new StreamReader(csDecrypt))Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            // Read the decrypted bytes from the decrypting streamDi2015NewLine                            // and place them in a string.Di2015NewLine                            plaintext = srDecrypt.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLine                            srDecrypt.Close();Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            finallyDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Clear the RijndaelManaged object.Di2015NewLine                if (aesAlg != null)Di2015NewLine                    aesAlg.Clear();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return plaintext;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

5462362Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class WorkDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // To start a thread using a shared thread procedure, useDi2015NewLine        // the class name and method name when you create the Di2015NewLine        // ParameterizedThreadStart delegate. C# infers the Di2015NewLine        // appropriate delegate creation syntax:Di2015NewLine        //    new ParameterizedThreadStart(Work.DoWork)Di2015NewLine        //Di2015NewLine        Thread newThread = new Thread(Work.DoWork);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Use the overload of the Start method that has aDi2015NewLine        // parameter of type Object. You can create an object thatDi2015NewLine        // contains several pieces of data, or you can pass any Di2015NewLine        // reference type or value type. The following code passesDi2015NewLine        // the integer value 42.Di2015NewLine        //Di2015NewLine        newThread.Start(42);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // To start a thread using an instance method for the thread Di2015NewLine        // procedure, use the instance variable and method name when Di2015NewLine        // you create the ParameterizedThreadStart delegate. C# infers Di2015NewLine        // the appropriate delegate creation syntax:Di2015NewLine        //    new ParameterizedThreadStart(w.DoMoreWork)Di2015NewLine        //Di2015NewLine        Work w = new Work();Di2015NewLine        newThread = new Thread(w.DoMoreWork);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Pass an object containing data for the thread.Di2015NewLine        //Di2015NewLine        newThread.Start("The answer.");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void DoWork(object data)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Static thread procedure. Data='{0}'",Di2015NewLine            data);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void DoMoreWork(object data)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Instance thread procedure. Data='{0}'",Di2015NewLine            data);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5464332Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static byte[] CreateGridImage(Di2015NewLine        int maxXCells,Di2015NewLine        int maxYCells,Di2015NewLine        int cellXPosition,Di2015NewLine        int cellYPosition,Di2015NewLine        int boxSize)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine             using (var bmp = new System.Drawing.Bitmap(maxXCells * boxSize+1, maxYCells * boxSize+1))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                using (Graphics g = Graphics.FromImage(bmp))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    g.Clear(Color.Yellow);Di2015NewLine                    Pen pen = new Pen(Color.Black);Di2015NewLine                    pen.Width = 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    //Draw red rectangle to go behind crossDi2015NewLine                    Rectangle rect = new Rectangle(boxSize * (cellXPosition - 1), boxSize * (cellYPosition - 1), boxSize, boxSize);Di2015NewLine                    g.FillRectangle(new SolidBrush(Color.Red), rect);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    //Draw crossDi2015NewLine                    g.DrawLine(pen, boxSize * (cellXPosition - 1), boxSize * (cellYPosition - 1), boxSize * cellXPosition, boxSize * cellYPosition);Di2015NewLine                    g.DrawLine(pen, boxSize * (cellXPosition - 1), boxSize * cellYPosition, boxSize * cellXPosition, boxSize * (cellYPosition - 1));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    //Draw horizontal linesDi2015NewLine                    for (int i = 0; i <= maxXCells;i++ )Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        g.DrawLine(pen, (i * boxSize), 0, i * boxSize, boxSize * maxYCells);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    //Draw vertical lines            Di2015NewLine                    for (int i = 0; i <= maxYCells; i++)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        g.DrawLine(pen, 0, (i * boxSize), boxSize * maxXCells, i * boxSize);Di2015NewLine                    }                    Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                var memStream = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLine                bmp.Save(memStream, ImageFormat.Jpeg);Di2015NewLine                return memStream.ToArray();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

5465300Di2015UniqueSeparator[StructLayout(LayoutKind.Sequential, CharSet = CharSet.Unicode, Pack = 1)]Di2015NewLinepublic struct FileRecordDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    [MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.ByValArray, SizeConst = 56)]Di2015NewLine    public char[] ID;Di2015NewLine    [MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.ByValArray, SizeConst = 56)]Di2015NewLine    public char[] Name;Di2015NewLine    public int Gender;Di2015NewLine    public float height;Di2015NewLine    //...Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    protected static T ReadStruct<T>(Stream stream)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        byte[] buffer = new byte[Marshal.SizeOf(typeof(T))];Di2015NewLine        stream.Read(buffer, 0, Marshal.SizeOf(typeof(T)));Di2015NewLine        GCHandle handle = GCHandle.Alloc(buffer, GCHandleType.Pinned);Di2015NewLine        T typedStruct = (T)Marshal.PtrToStructure(handle.AddrOfPinnedObject(), typeof(T));Di2015NewLine        handle.Free();Di2015NewLine        return typedStruct;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (Stream stream = new FileStream(@"test.bin", FileMode.Open, FileAccess.Read))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            FileRecord fileRecord = ReadStruct<FileRecord>(stream);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

5465693Di2015UniqueSeparator[ModifyResponseExtensionAttribute]
5465693Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ModifyResponseExtension : SoapExtensionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Stream inStream;Di2015NewLine    Stream outStream;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Save the Stream representing the SOAP request or SOAP response intoDi2015NewLine    // a local memory buffer.Di2015NewLine    public override Stream ChainStream(Stream stream)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        inStream = stream;Di2015NewLine        outStream = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLine        return outStream;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //This can get properties out of the Attribute used to enable thisDi2015NewLine    public override object GetInitializer(LogicalMethodInfo methodInfo, SoapExtensionAttribute attribute)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //This would have default settings when enabled by config fileDi2015NewLine    public override object GetInitializer(Type WebServiceType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Receive the object returned by GetInitializer-- set any options hereDi2015NewLine    public override void Initialize(object initializer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //  If the SoapMessageStage is such that the SoapRequest orDi2015NewLine    //  SoapResponse is still in the SOAP format to be sent or received,Di2015NewLine    //  save it out to a file.Di2015NewLine    public override void ProcessMessage(SoapMessage message)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        switch (message.Stage)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case SoapMessageStage.BeforeSerialize:Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case SoapMessageStage.AfterSerialize:Di2015NewLine                //This is after the Request has been serialized, I don't need to modify this so just copy the stream as-isDi2015NewLine                outStream.Position = 0;Di2015NewLine                Copy(outStream, inStream);Di2015NewLine                //Not sure if this is needed (MSDN does not have it) but I like closing thingsDi2015NewLine                outStream.Close();Di2015NewLine                inStream.Close();Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case SoapMessageStage.BeforeDeserialize:Di2015NewLine                //This is before the Response has been deserialized, modify hereDi2015NewLine                //Could also modify based on something in the SoapMessage object if neededDi2015NewLine                ModifyResponseMessage();Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case SoapMessageStage.AfterDeserialize:Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void ModifyResponseMessage()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        TextReader reader = new StreamReader(inStream);Di2015NewLine        TextWriter writer = new StreamWriter(outStream);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Using a StringBuilder for the replacements hereDi2015NewLine        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder(reader.ReadToEnd());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Modify the stream so it will deserialize with the current version (downgrading to Version1_1 here)Di2015NewLine        sb.Replace("SummaryData_Version2_2Impl", "SummaryData_Version1_1Impl")Di2015NewLine            .Replace("SummaryData_Version3_3Impl", "SummaryData_Version1_1Impl")Di2015NewLine            .Replace("SummaryData_Version4_4Impl", "SummaryData_Version1_1Impl");Di2015NewLine        //Replace the namespaceDi2015NewLine        sb.Replace("http://version2_2", "http://version1_1")Di2015NewLine            .Replace("http://version3_3", "http://version1_1")Di2015NewLine            .Replace("http://version4_4", "http://version1_1");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Note: Can output to a log message here if needed, with sb.ToString() to check what is different between the version responsesDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        writer.WriteLine(sb.ToString());Di2015NewLine        writer.Flush();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Not sure if this is needed (MSDN does not have it) but I like closing thingsDi2015NewLine        inStream.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        outStream.Position = 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void Copy(Stream from, Stream to)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        TextReader reader = new StreamReader(from);Di2015NewLine        TextWriter writer = new StreamWriter(to);Di2015NewLine        writer.WriteLine(reader.ReadToEnd());Di2015NewLine        writer.Flush();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Create a SoapExtensionAttribute for the SOAP Extension that can beDi2015NewLine// applied to an XML Web service method.Di2015NewLine[AttributeUsage(AttributeTargets.Method)]Di2015NewLinepublic class ModifyResponseExtensionAttribute : SoapExtensionAttributeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private int priority;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override Type ExtensionTypeDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return typeof(ModifyResponseExtension); }Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected virtual void OnNcMouseMove(MouseEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      if (this.WindowState == FormWindowState.Minimized && _lastForm != this)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        _lastForm = this;Di2015NewLine        Point pt = MdiParent.PointToScreen(this.Location);Di2015NewLine        ShowWindowTip(pt, _lastSnapshot);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected virtual void OnMinimize(EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      _tooltip.Visible = false;Di2015NewLine      if (_lastSnapshot == null)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        _lastSnapshot = new Bitmap(100, 100);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      using (Image windowImage = new Bitmap(ClientRectangle.Width, ClientRectangle.Height))Di2015NewLine      using (Graphics windowGraphics = Graphics.FromImage(windowImage))Di2015NewLine      using (Graphics tipGraphics = Graphics.FromImage(_lastSnapshot))Di2015NewLine      {      Di2015NewLine        Rectangle r = this.RectangleToScreen(ClientRectangle);Di2015NewLine        windowGraphics.CopyFromScreen(new Point(r.Left, r.Top), Point.Empty, new Size(r.Width, r.Height));Di2015NewLine        windowGraphics.Flush();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        float scaleX = 1;Di2015NewLine        float scaleY = 1;Di2015NewLine        if (ClientRectangle.Width > ClientRectangle.Height)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine          scaleY = (float)ClientRectangle.Height / ClientRectangle.Width;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (ClientRectangle.Height > ClientRectangle.Width)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine          scaleX = (float)ClientRectangle.Width / ClientRectangle.Height;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        tipGraphics.DrawImage(windowImage, 0, 0, 100 * scaleX, 100 * scaleY);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void ShowWindowTip(Point pt, Image image)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      if (_tooltip.Visible)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        _tooltip.Visible = false;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      _tooltip.Image = image;Di2015NewLine      _tooltip.Show();Di2015NewLine      _tooltip.Location = new Point(pt.X, pt.Y - _tooltip.Height - 10);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static int WM_NCMOUSEMOVE = 0x00A0;Di2015NewLine    private static int WM_COMMAND = 0x0112;Di2015NewLine    private static 5471134Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.ComponentModel;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq.Expressions;Di2015NewLine[AttributeUsage(AttributeTargets.Property, AllowMultiple = false, Inherited = false)]Di2015NewLinepublic class FilterFieldAttribute: AttributeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static T Clone<T>(T obj) where T : class, new()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return Cache<T>.clone(obj);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private static class Cache<T> where T : class, new()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public static readonly Func<T,T> clone;Di2015NewLine        static Cache()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var param = Expression.Parameter(typeof(T), "source");Di2015NewLine            var members = from prop in typeof(T).GetProperties()Di2015NewLine                          where Attribute.IsDefined(prop, typeof(FilterFieldAttribute))Di2015NewLine                          select Expression.Bind(prop, Expression.Property(param, prop));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var newObj = Expression.MemberInit(Expression.New(typeof(T)), members);Di2015NewLine            clone = Expression.Lambda<Func<T,T>>(newObj, param).Compile();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine} Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class OrdersViewModel Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    [FilterField]Di2015NewLine    [DisplayName("Order Number:")]Di2015NewLine    public string OrderNumber { get; 5473218Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic virtual string UniqueID { Di2015NewLine    get { Di2015NewLine        if (_cachedUniqueID != null) {Di2015NewLine            return _cachedUniqueID; Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Control namingContainer = NamingContainer;Di2015NewLine        if (namingContainer != null) { Di2015NewLine            // if the ID is null at this point, we need to have one created and the control added to theDi2015NewLine            // naming container. Di2015NewLine            if (_id == null) { Di2015NewLine                GenerateAutomaticID();Di2015NewLine            } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (Page == namingContainer) {Di2015NewLine                _cachedUniqueID = _id;Di2015NewLine            } Di2015NewLine            else {Di2015NewLine                string uniqueIDPrefix = namingContainer.GetUniqueIDPrefix(); Di2015NewLine                if (uniqueIDPrefix.Length == 0) { Di2015NewLine                    // In this case, it is probably a naming container that is not sited, so we don't want to cache itDi2015NewLine                    return _id; Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                else {Di2015NewLine                    _cachedUniqueID = uniqueIDPrefix + _id;Di2015NewLine                } Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return _cachedUniqueID; Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else { Di2015NewLine            // no naming containerDi2015NewLine            return _id;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
5473218Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void UpdateNamingContainer(Control namingContainer) {Di2015NewLine    // Remove the cached uniqueID if the control already had a namingcontainerDi2015NewLine    // and the namingcontainer is changed. Di2015NewLine    if (_namingContainer != null && _namingContainer != namingContainer) {Di2015NewLine        ClearCachedUniqueIDRecursive(); Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    _namingContainer = namingContainer; Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5476355Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic ActionResult Login(string username, string password)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // TODO: validate username/password couple and Di2015NewLine    // if they are valid get the roles for the userDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var roles = "RoleA|RoleC";Di2015NewLine    var ticket = new FormsAuthenticationTicket(Di2015NewLine        1, Di2015NewLine        username,Di2015NewLine        DateTime.Now, Di2015NewLine        DateTime.Now.AddMilliseconds(FormsAuthentication.Timeout.TotalMilliseconds), Di2015NewLine        false, Di2015NewLine        rolesDi2015NewLine    );Di2015NewLine    var encryptedTicket = FormsAuthentication.Encrypt(ticket);Di2015NewLine    var authCookie = new HttpCookie(FormsAuthentication.FormsCookieName, encryptedTicket)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // IIRC this property is only available in .NET 4.0,Di2015NewLine        // so you might need a constant here to match the domain propertyDi2015NewLine        // in the <forms> tag of the web.configDi2015NewLine        Domain = FormsAuthentication.CookieDomain,Di2015NewLine        HttpOnly = true,Di2015NewLine        Secure = FormsAuthentication.RequireSSL,Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLine    Response.AppendCookie(authCookie);Di2015NewLine    return RedirectToAction("SomeSecureAction");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
5476355Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class MyAuthorizeAttribute : AuthorizeAttributeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    protected override bool AuthorizeCore(HttpContextBase httpContext)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (httpContext.User.Identity.IsAuthenticated)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var authCookie = httpContext.Request.Cookies[FormsAuthentication.FormsCookieName];Di2015NewLine            if (authCookie != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var ticket = FormsAuthentication.Decrypt(authCookie.Value);Di2015NewLine                var roles = ticket.UserData.Split('|');Di2015NewLine                var identity = new GenericIdentity(ticket.Name);Di2015NewLine                httpContext.User = new GenericPrincipal(identity, roles);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return base.AuthorizeCore(httpContext);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5476721Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// A simple ViewModel to demonstrate MVVMDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLinepublic sealed class ViewModel : DependencyObject, IDataErrorInfoDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    #region PropertiesDi2015NewLine    #region DirectoryNameDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// The <see cref="DependencyProperty"/> for <see cref="DirectoryName"/>.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public static readonly DependencyProperty DirectoryNameProperty =Di2015NewLine        DependencyProperty.Register(Di2015NewLine            DirectoryNameName,Di2015NewLine            typeof(string),Di2015NewLine            typeof(ViewModel),Di2015NewLine            new UIPropertyMetadata(null));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// The name of the <see cref="DirectoryName"/> <see cref="DependencyProperty"/>.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public const string DirectoryNameName = "DirectoryName";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public object DirectoryNameDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return (object)GetValue(DirectoryNameProperty); }Di2015NewLine        set { SetValue(DirectoryNameProperty, value); }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region SelectedFileDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// The <see cref="DependencyProperty"/> for <see cref="SelectedFile"/>.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public static readonly DependencyProperty SelectedFileProperty =Di2015NewLine        DependencyProperty.Register(Di2015NewLine            SelectedFileName,Di2015NewLine            typeof(FileInfo),Di2015NewLine            typeof(ViewModel),Di2015NewLine            new UIPropertyMetadata(null));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// The name of the <see cref="SelectedFile"/> <see cref="DependencyProperty"/>.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public const string SelectedFileName = "SelectedFile";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public FileInfo SelectedFileDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return (FileInfo)GetValue(SelectedFileProperty); }Di2015NewLine        set { SetValue(SelectedFileProperty, value); }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// The files found under <see cref="DirectoryName"/>.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public ObservableCollection<FileInfo> Files { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Holds the last filename error for IDataErrorInfoDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    private string _lastDirectoryNameError = null;Di2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region ctorDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="ViewModel"/> class.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public ViewModel()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Files = new ObservableCollection<FileInfo>();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region methodsDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Invoked whenever the effective value of any dependency property on this <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject"/> has been updated. The specific dependency property that changed is reported in the event data.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="e">Event data that will contain the dependency property identifier of interest, the property metadata for the type, and old and new values.</param>Di2015NewLine    protected override void OnPropertyChanged(DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        base.OnPropertyChanged(e);Di2015NewLine        if (e.Property == DirectoryNameProperty)Di2015NewLine            UpdateFiles(e.OldValue as string, e.NewValue as string);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Updates <see cref="Files"/> when <see cref="DirectoryName"/> changes.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="oldDirectoryName">The old value of <see cref="DirectoryName"/></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="newDirectoryName">The new value of <see cref="DirectoryName"/></param>Di2015NewLine    private void UpdateFiles(string oldDirectoryName, string newDirectoryName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(newDirectoryName))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Files.Clear();Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(oldDirectoryName) &&Di2015NewLine            oldDirectoryName.Equals(newDirectoryName, StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase))Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var di = new DirectoryInfo(Directory.Exists(newDirectoryName) ? newDirectoryName : Path.GetDirectoryName(newDirectoryName));Di2015NewLine            // dirty hackDi2015NewLine            if (di.ToString().Equals(".", StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _lastDirectoryNameError = "Not a valid directory name.";Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            Files.Clear();Di2015NewLine            foreach (var file in di.GetFiles())Di2015NewLine                Files.Add(file);Di2015NewLine            _lastDirectoryNameError = null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception ioe)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _lastDirectoryNameError = ioe.Message;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region IDataErrorInfoDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Gets an error message indicating what is wrong with this object.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>An error message indicating what is wrong with this object. The default is an empty string ("").</returns>Di2015NewLine    string IDataErrorInfo.ErrorDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return _lastDirectoryNameError;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Gets the error message for the property with the given name.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>The error message for the property. The default is an empty string ("").</returns>Di2015NewLine    string IDataErrorInfo.this[string columnName]Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (columnName.Equals(DirectoryNameName, StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase))Di2015NewLine                return _lastDirectoryNameError;Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5480976Di2015UniqueSeparatorStack
5480976Di2015UniqueSeparatorHashSet
5480976Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static string[] FindPathToProperty(object item, string propertyValueToFind)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var pathToProperty = new Stack<string>();Di2015NewLine        var visitedObjects = new HashSet<object> {item};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        FindPathToProperty(item, propertyValueToFind, pathToProperty, visitedObjects);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var finalPath = pathToProperty.ToArray();Di2015NewLine        Array.Reverse(finalPath);Di2015NewLine        return finalPath;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static bool FindPathToProperty(object item, string propertyValueToFind, Stack<string> pathToProperty, HashSet<object> visitedObjects)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (var property in item.GetType().GetProperties(BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.Instance))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var value = property.GetValue(item, null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (visitedObjects.Contains(value))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    continue;                       Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                visitedObjects.Add(value);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                pathToProperty.Push(property.Name);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                bool found = false;Di2015NewLine                tryDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    found = propertyValueToFind.Equals(value) ||Di2015NewLine                            FindPathToProperty(value, propertyValueToFind, pathToProperty, visitedObjects);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                finallyDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (!found)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        pathToProperty.Pop();Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                if (found)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return true;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catchDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                continue;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void Test()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Test(new { X = "find" }, "X");Di2015NewLine        Test(new { X = "no", Y = "find" }, "Y");Di2015NewLine        Test(new { A = new { X = "no", Y = "find" } }, "A.Y");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void Test(object item, string expected)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string actual = string.Join(".", FindPathToProperty(item, "find"));Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("{0} : {1}\\r\\n      {2}",Di2015NewLine                          actual == expected ? "ok " : "BAD",Di2015NewLine                          expected,Di2015NewLine                          actual);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

5485094Di2015UniqueSeparatorPublic Custom Event CanExecuteChanged As EventHandler _Di2015NewLine    Implements ICommand.CanExecuteChangedDi2015NewLine        AddHandler(ByVal value As EventHandler)Di2015NewLine            Dim handler2 As EventHandlerDi2015NewLine            Dim canExecuteCommand = __CanExecuteCommandDi2015NewLine            DoDi2015NewLine                handler2 = canExecuteCommandDi2015NewLine                Dim handler3 = DirectCast(System.Delegate.Combine(handler2, value), EventHandler)Di2015NewLine                canExecuteCommand = Interlocked.CompareExchange((__CanExecuteCommand), handler3, handler2)Di2015NewLine            Loop While (Not canExecuteCommand Is handler2)Di2015NewLine            __CanExecuteCommand = canExecuteCommandDi2015NewLine        End AddHandlerDi2015NewLine        RemoveHandler(ByVal value As EventHandler)Di2015NewLine            Dim handler2 As EventHandlerDi2015NewLine            Dim canExecuteCommand = __CanExecuteCommandDi2015NewLine            DoDi2015NewLine                handler2 = canExecuteCommandDi2015NewLine                Dim handler3 = DirectCast(System.Delegate.Remove(handler2, value), EventHandler)Di2015NewLine                canExecuteCommand = Interlocked.CompareExchange((__CanExecuteCommand), handler3, handler2)Di2015NewLine            Loop While (Not canExecuteCommand Is handler2)Di2015NewLine            __CanExecuteCommand = canExecuteCommandDi2015NewLine        End RemoveHandlerDi2015NewLine        RaiseEvent(ByVal sender As Object, ByVal e As EventArgs)Di2015NewLine            If (__CanExecuteCommand IsNot Nothing) ThenDi2015NewLine                __CanExecuteCommand.Invoke(sender, e)Di2015NewLine            End IfDi2015NewLine        End RaiseEventDi2015NewLine    End EventDi2015NewLine

5486471Di2015UniqueSeparator// Create the base task.  Run synchronously.Di2015NewLinevar task = new Task(() => { });Di2015NewLinetask.RunSynchronously();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Chain them all together.Di2015NewLinevar query = Di2015NewLine    // For each actionDi2015NewLine    from action in actionsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Assign the task to the continuation andDi2015NewLine    // return that.Di2015NewLine    select (task = task.ContinueWith(action));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Get the last task to wait on.Di2015NewLine// Note that this cannot be changed to "Last"Di2015NewLine// because the actions enumeration could have noDi2015NewLine// elements, meaning that Last would throw.Di2015NewLine// That means task can be null, so a checkDi2015NewLine// would have to be performed on it beforeDi2015NewLine// waiting on it (unless you are assured thatDi2015NewLine// there are items in the action enumeration).Di2015NewLinetask = query.LastOrDefault();Di2015NewLine

5488404Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class SortableObservableCollection<T> : ObservableCollection<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // ConstructorsDi2015NewLine    public SortableObservableCollection() : base(){}Di2015NewLine    public SortableObservableCollection(List<T> l) : base(l){}Di2015NewLine    public SortableObservableCollection(IEnumerable<T> l) :base (l) {}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region SortingDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Sorts the items of the collection in ascending order according to a key.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <typeparam name="TKey">The type of the key returned by <paramref name="keySelector"/>.</typeparam>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="keySelector">A function to extract a key from an item.</param>Di2015NewLine    public void Sort<TKey>(Func<T, TKey> keySelector)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        InternalSort(Items.OrderBy(keySelector));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Sorts the items of the collection in descending order according to a key.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <typeparam name="TKey">The type of the key returned by <paramref name="keySelector"/>.</typeparam>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="keySelector">A function to extract a key from an item.</param>Di2015NewLine    public void SortDescending<TKey>(Func<T, TKey> keySelector)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        InternalSort(Items.OrderByDescending(keySelector));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Sorts the items of the collection in ascending order according to a key.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <typeparam name="TKey">The type of the key returned by <paramref name="keySelector"/>.</typeparam>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="keySelector">A function to extract a key from an item.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="comparer">An <see cref="IComparer{T}"/> to compare keys.</param>Di2015NewLine    public void Sort<TKey>(Func<T, TKey> keySelector, IComparer<TKey> comparer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        InternalSort(Items.OrderBy(keySelector, comparer));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Moves the items of the collection so that their orders are the same as those of the items provided.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="sortedItems">An <see cref="IEnumerable{T}"/> to provide item orders.</param>Di2015NewLine    private void InternalSort(IEnumerable<T> sortedItems)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var sortedItemsList = sortedItems.ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var item in sortedItemsList)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Move(IndexOf(item), sortedItemsList.IndexOf(item));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #endregion // SortingDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5492396Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class LogoutModule: IHttpModuleDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    #region IHttpModule MembersDi2015NewLine    void IHttpModule.Dispose() { }Di2015NewLine    void IHttpModule.Init(HttpApplication context)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        context.AuthenticateRequest += new EventHandler(context_AuthenticateRequest);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Handle the authentication request and force logouts according to web.configDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <remarks>See "How To Implement IPrincipal" in MSDN</remarks>Di2015NewLine    private void context_AuthenticateRequest(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        HttpApplication a = (HttpApplication)sender;Di2015NewLine        HttpContext context = a.Context;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Extract the forms authentication cookieDi2015NewLine        string cookieName = FormsAuthentication.FormsCookieName;Di2015NewLine        HttpCookie authCookie = context.Request.Cookies[cookieName];Di2015NewLine        DateTime? logoutTime = ConfigurationManager.AppSettings["forcedLogout"] as DateTime?;Di2015NewLine        if (authCookie != null && logoutTime != null && authCookie.Expires < logoutTime.Value)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Delete the auth cookie and let them start over.Di2015NewLine            authCookie.Expires = DateTime.Now.AddDays(-1);Di2015NewLine            context.Response.Cookies.Add(authCookie);Di2015NewLine            context.Response.Redirect(FormsAuthentication.LoginUrl);Di2015NewLine            context.Response.End();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5497603Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System.Threading;Di2015NewLine//...Di2015NewLinepublic class TimerExampleDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private System.Threading.Timer m_objTimer;Di2015NewLine    private bool m_blnStarted;Di2015NewLine    private readonly int m_intTickMs = 1000;Di2015NewLine    private object m_objLockObject = new object();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public TimerExample()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Create your timer object, but don't start anything yetDi2015NewLine        m_objTimer = new System.Threading.Timer(callback, m_objTimer, Timeout.Infinite, Timeout.Infinite);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Start()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!m_blnStarted)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            lock (m_objLockObject)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (!m_blnStarted) //double check after lock to be thread safeDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    m_blnStarted = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    //Make it start in 'm_intTickMs' milliseconds, Di2015NewLine                    //but don't auto callback when it's done (Timeout.Infinite)Di2015NewLine                    m_objTimer.Change(m_intTickMs, Timeout.Infinite);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Stop()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (m_objLockObject)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            m_blnStarted = false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void callback(object state)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        System.Diagnostics.Debug.WriteLine("callback invoked");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //TODO: your code hereDi2015NewLine        Thread.Sleep(4000);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //When your code has finished running, wait 'm_intTickMs' millisecondsDi2015NewLine        //and call the callback method again, Di2015NewLine        //but don't auto callback (Timeout.Infinite)Di2015NewLine        m_objTimer.Change(m_intTickMs, Timeout.Infinite);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5501565Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineusing System.Net;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//---Based on code written by "Neil Young" (neil.young@freenet.de)Di2015NewLine//---Source: http://maps.alphadex.de/datafiles/fct0e1b11782832f02.csDi2015NewLinenamespace GoogleMapsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class GMMDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static byte[] PostData(int MCC, int MNC, int LAC, int CID, Di2015NewLine                               bool shortCID)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            /* The shortCID parameter follows heuristic experiences:Di2015NewLine             * Sometimes UMTS CIDs are build up from the original GSM CID (lower 4 hex digits)Di2015NewLine             * and the RNC-ID left shifted into the upper 4 digits.Di2015NewLine             */Di2015NewLine            byte[] pd = new byte[] {Di2015NewLine                0x00, 0x0e,Di2015NewLine                0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00,Di2015NewLine                0x00, 0x00,Di2015NewLine                0x00, 0x00,Di2015NewLine                0x00, 0x00,Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                0x1b, Di2015NewLine                0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, // Offset 0x11Di2015NewLine                0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, // Offset 0x15Di2015NewLine                0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, // Offset 0x19Di2015NewLine                0x00, 0x00,Di2015NewLine                0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, // Offset 0x1fDi2015NewLine                0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, // Offset 0x23Di2015NewLine                0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, // Offset 0x27Di2015NewLine                0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, // Offset 0x2bDi2015NewLine                0xff, 0xff, 0xff, 0xff,Di2015NewLine                0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            bool isUMTSCell = ((Int64)CID > 65535);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (isUMTSCell)Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("UMTS CID. {0}", shortCID ? Di2015NewLine                    "Using short CID to resolve." : "");Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("GSM CID given.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (shortCID)Di2015NewLine                CID &= 0xFFFF;      /* Attempt to resolve the cell using the Di2015NewLine                                    GSM CID part */Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if ((Int64)CID > 65536) /* GSM: 4 hex digits, UTMS: 6 hex Di2015NewLine                                    digits */Di2015NewLine                pd[0x1c] = 5;Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                pd[0x1c] = 3;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            pd[0x11] = (byte)((MNC >> 24) & 0xFF);Di2015NewLine            pd[0x12] = (byte)((MNC >> 16) & 0xFF);Di2015NewLine            pd[0x13] = (byte)((MNC >> 8) & 0xFF);Di2015NewLine            pd[0x14] = (byte)((MNC >> 0) & 0xFF);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            pd[0x15] = (byte)((MCC >> 24) & 0xFF);Di2015NewLine            pd[0x16] = (byte)((MCC >> 16) & 0xFF);Di2015NewLine            pd[0x17] = (byte)((MCC >> 8) & 0xFF);Di2015NewLine            pd[0x18] = (byte)((MCC >> 0) & 0xFF);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            pd[0x27] = (byte)((MNC >> 24) & 0xFF);Di2015NewLine            pd[0x28] = (byte)((MNC >> 16) & 0xFF);Di2015NewLine            pd[0x29] = (byte)((MNC >> 8) & 0xFF);Di2015NewLine            pd[0x2a] = (byte)((MNC >> 0) & 0xFF);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            pd[0x2b] = (byte)((MCC >> 24) & 0xFF);Di2015NewLine            pd[0x2c] = (byte)((MCC >> 16) & 0xFF);Di2015NewLine            pd[0x2d] = (byte)((MCC >> 8) & 0xFF);Di2015NewLine            pd[0x2e] = (byte)((MCC >> 0) & 0xFF);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            pd[0x1f] = (byte)((CID >> 24) & 0xFF);Di2015NewLine            pd[0x20] = (byte)((CID >> 16) & 0xFF);Di2015NewLine            pd[0x21] = (byte)((CID >> 8) & 0xFF);Di2015NewLine            pd[0x22] = (byte)((CID >> 0) & 0xFF);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            pd[0x23] = (byte)((LAC >> 24) & 0xFF);Di2015NewLine            pd[0x24] = (byte)((LAC >> 16) & 0xFF);Di2015NewLine            pd[0x25] = (byte)((LAC >> 8) & 0xFF);Di2015NewLine            pd[0x26] = (byte)((LAC >> 0) & 0xFF);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return pd;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static public string GetLatLng(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (args.Length < 4)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return string.Empty;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            string shortCID = "";   /* Default, no change at all */Di2015NewLine            if (args.Length == 5)Di2015NewLine                shortCID = args[4].ToLower();Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                String url = "http://www.google.com/glm/mmap";Di2015NewLine                HttpWebRequest req = (HttpWebRequest)WebRequest.Create(Di2015NewLine                    new Uri(url));Di2015NewLine                req.Method = "POST";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                int MCC = Convert.ToInt32(args[0]);Di2015NewLine                int MNC = Convert.ToInt32(args[1]);Di2015NewLine                int LAC = Convert.ToInt32(args[2]);Di2015NewLine                int CID = Convert.ToInt32(args[3]);Di2015NewLine                byte[] pd = PostData(MCC, MNC, LAC, CID, Di2015NewLine                    shortCID == "shortcid");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                req.ContentLength = pd.Length;Di2015NewLine                req.ContentType = "application/binary";Di2015NewLine                Stream outputStream = req.GetRequestStream();Di2015NewLine                outputStream.Write(pd, 0, pd.Length);Di2015NewLine                outputStream.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                HttpWebResponse res = (HttpWebResponse)req.GetResponse();Di2015NewLine                byte[] ps = new byte[res.ContentLength];Di2015NewLine                int totalBytesRead = 0;Di2015NewLine                while (totalBytesRead < ps.Length)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    totalBytesRead += res.GetResponseStream().Read(Di2015NewLine                        ps, totalBytesRead, ps.Length - totalBytesRead);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (res.StatusCode == HttpStatusCode.OK)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    short opcode1 = (short)(ps[0] << 8 | ps[1]);Di2015NewLine                    byte opcode2 = ps[2];Di2015NewLine                    int ret_code = (int)((ps[3] << 24) | (ps[4] << 16) |Di2015NewLine                                   (ps[5] << 8) | (ps[6]));Di2015NewLine                    if (ret_code == 0)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        double lat = ((double)((ps[7] << 24) | (ps[8] << 16) Di2015NewLine                                     | (ps[9] << 8) | (ps[10]))) / 1000000;Di2015NewLine                        double lon = ((double)((ps[11] << 24) | (ps[12] << Di2015NewLine                                     16) | (ps[13] << 8) | (ps[14]))) / Di2015NewLine                                     1000000;Di2015NewLine                        return lat + "|" + lon;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                        return string.Empty;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                    return string.Empty;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return string.Empty;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5505346Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Image GetImage(Visual target)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (target == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return null; // No visual - no image.Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    var bounds = VisualTreeHelper.GetDescendantBounds(target);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var bitmapHeight = 0;Di2015NewLine    var bitmapWidth = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (bounds != Rect.Empty)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        bitmapHeight = (int)(Math.Floor(bounds.Height) + 1);Di2015NewLine        bitmapWidth = (int)(Math.Floor(bounds.Width) + 1);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    const double dpi = 96.0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var renderBitmap =Di2015NewLine        new RenderTargetBitmap(bitmapWidth, bitmapHeight, dpi, dpi, PixelFormats.Pbgra32);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var visual = new DrawingVisual();Di2015NewLine    using (var context = visual.RenderOpen())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var brush = new VisualBrush(target);Di2015NewLine        context.DrawRectangle(brush, null, new Rect(new Point(), bounds.Size));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    renderBitmap.Render(visual);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return new ImageDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Source = renderBitmap,Di2015NewLine        Width = bitmapWidth,Di2015NewLine        Height = bitmapHeightDi2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5508864Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class GSInterfaceDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string GhostScriptExePath { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public GSInterface(string gsExePath)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.GhostScriptExePath = gsExePath;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public virtual void CallGhostScript(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var p = new Process();Di2015NewLine        p.StartInfo.FileName = this.GhostScriptExePath;Di2015NewLine        p.StartInfo.Arguments = string.Join(" ", args);Di2015NewLine        p.StartInfo.WindowStyle = ProcessWindowStyle.Hidden;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        p.Start();Di2015NewLine        p.WaitForExit();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Print(string filename, string printerName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.CallGhostScript(new string[] {Di2015NewLine            "-q",Di2015NewLine            "-sDEVICE=mswinpr2",Di2015NewLine            "-sPAPERSIZE=a4",Di2015NewLine            "-dNOPAUSE",Di2015NewLine            "-dNoCancel",Di2015NewLine            "-dBATCH",Di2015NewLine            "-dDuplex",Di2015NewLine            string.Format(@"-sOutputFile=""\\\\spool\\{0}""", printerName),Di2015NewLine            string.Format(@"""{0}""", filename)Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
