5508909Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar mailingMergeString = new MailingMergeString(input);Di2015NewLinevar output = mailingMergeString.ParseMailingMergeString();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class MailingMergeStringDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private string _input;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public MailingMergeString(string input)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _input = input;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string ParseMailingMergeString()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        IList<SqlReplaceCommand> sqlCommands = new List<SqlReplaceCommand>();Di2015NewLine        var i = 0;Di2015NewLine        const string openBrace = "{";Di2015NewLine        const string closeBrace = "}";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(_input) == false)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var sqlReplaceCommand = new SqlReplaceCommand();Di2015NewLine            var open = _input.IndexOf(openBrace) + 1;Di2015NewLine            var close = _input.IndexOf(closeBrace);Di2015NewLine            var length = close != -1 ? close - open : _input.Length;Di2015NewLine            var newInput = _input.Substring(close + 1);Di2015NewLine            var nextClose = newInput.Contains(openBrace) ? newInput.IndexOf(openBrace) : newInput.Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (i == 0 && open > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                sqlReplaceCommand.Text = _input.Substring(0, open - 1);Di2015NewLine                _input = _input.Substring(open - 1);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                sqlReplaceCommand.Command = _input.Substring(open, length);Di2015NewLine                sqlReplaceCommand.PlaceHolder = openBrace + i + closeBrace;Di2015NewLine                sqlReplaceCommand.Text = _input.Substring(close + 1, nextClose);Di2015NewLine                sqlReplaceCommand.NewInput = _input.Substring(close + 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                _input = newInput.Contains(openBrace) ? sqlReplaceCommand.NewInput : string.Empty;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            sqlCommands.Add(sqlReplaceCommand);Di2015NewLine            i++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return sqlCommands.GetParsedString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    internal class SqlReplaceCommandDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public string Command { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public string SqlResult { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public string PlaceHolder { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public string Text { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        protected internal string NewInput { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineinternal static class SqlReplaceExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static string GetParsedString(this IEnumerable<MailingMergeString.SqlReplaceCommand> sqlCommands)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return sqlCommands.Aggregate("", (current, replaceCommand) => current + (replaceCommand.PlaceHolder + replaceCommand.Text));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5514619Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static bool LineIntersectsRect(Point p1, Point p2, Rectangle r)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return LineIntersectsLine(p1, p2, new Point(r.X, r.Y), new Point(r.X + r.Width, r.Y)) ||Di2015NewLine               LineIntersectsLine(p1, p2, new Point(r.X + r.Width, r.Y), new Point(r.X + r.Width, r.Y + r.Height)) ||Di2015NewLine               LineIntersectsLine(p1, p2, new Point(r.X + r.Width, r.Y + r.Height), new Point(r.X, r.Y + r.Height)) ||Di2015NewLine               LineIntersectsLine(p1, p2, new Point(r.X, r.Y + r.Height), new Point(r.X, r.Y)) ||Di2015NewLine               (r.Contains(p1) && r.Contains(p2));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static bool LineIntersectsLine(Point l1p1, Point l1p2, Point l2p1, Point l2p2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        float q = (l1p1.Y - l2p1.Y) * (l2p2.X - l2p1.X) - (l1p1.X - l2p1.X) * (l2p2.Y - l2p1.Y);Di2015NewLine        float d = (l1p2.X - l1p1.X) * (l2p2.Y - l2p1.Y) - (l1p2.Y - l1p1.Y) * (l2p2.X - l2p1.X);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if( d == 0 )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        float r = q / d;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        q = (l1p1.Y - l2p1.Y) * (l1p2.X - l1p1.X) - (l1p1.X - l2p1.X) * (l1p2.Y - l1p1.Y);Di2015NewLine        float s = q / d;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if( r < 0 || r > 1 || s < 0 || s > 1 )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

(Stream)typeHttpInputStreamDi2015NewLine    .GetConstructor(BindingFlags.NonPublic | BindingFlags.Instance, null, streamParams, null)Di2015NewLine    .Invoke(new object[] {uploadedContent, 0, 5523065Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void Form_Load(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    treeView.Nodes.Add(GetDirectoryNodes(@"C:\\TEST", new string[] { @"C:\\TeST\\C", @"C:\\TEST\\E" }));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static TreeNode GetDirectoryNodes(string path, string[] exclusions)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var node = new TreeNode(Path.GetFileName(path));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var subDirs = (from d in Directory.GetDirectories(path)Di2015NewLine                   where !exclusions.Contains(d,StringComparer.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase)Di2015NewLine                   select GetDirectoryNodes(d,exclusions)).ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    node.Nodes.AddRange(subDirs);Di2015NewLine    return node;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5527425Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// This method takes in an ArrayList of unsorted numbers in the format: a:bDi2015NewLine/// and returns a sorted List<string> with a descending, b ascendingDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLinepublic List<string> SortMyValues(ArrayList unsorted)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Declare an empty, generic List of type 'TwoNumbers'Di2015NewLine    List<MyTuple> values = new List<MyTuple>();Di2015NewLine    foreach (object item in unsorted)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        char[] splitChar = new char[] { ':' };Di2015NewLine        string itemString = item as string;Di2015NewLine        string[] s = itemString.Split(splitChar);Di2015NewLine        values.Add(new MyTuple{Di2015NewLine            FirstNumber = int.Parse(s[0]),Di2015NewLine            SecondNumber = int.Parse(s[1])Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // Sort the valuesDi2015NewLine    values.Sort();Di2015NewLine    // Return a list of strings, in the format givenDi2015NewLine    List<string> sorted = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine    foreach (MyTuple item in values)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        sorted.Add(item.FirstNumber + ":" + item.SecondNumber);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return sorted;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class MyTuple : IComparable {Di2015NewLine    public int FirstNumber { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public int SecondNumber { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int CompareTo(object obj)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (obj is MyTuple)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            MyTuple other = (MyTuple)obj;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // First number descendingDi2015NewLine            if (FirstNumber != other.FirstNumber)Di2015NewLine            return other.FirstNumber.CompareTo(FirstNumber);Di2015NewLine            // Second number ascendingDi2015NewLine        return SecondNumber.CompareTo(other.SecondNumber);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException("object is not a MyTuple");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
5527425Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// This method takes in an ArrayList of unsorted numbers in the format: a:bDi2015NewLine/// and returns a sorted List<string> with a descending, b ascendingDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLinepublic List<string> SortMyValues(ArrayList unsorted)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // First, cast every single element of the given ArrayList to a stringDi2015NewLine    // The Cast<T> method will do this, and return an enumerable collectionDi2015NewLine    return unsorted.Cast<string>()Di2015NewLine        // Now, let's take this string data and create our objects that will hold two numbersDi2015NewLine        .Select(item => {Di2015NewLine            // This is the body of an anonymous method with one parameter, which I called 'item'Di2015NewLine            // This anonymous method will be executed for every element in the collectionDi2015NewLine            string[] s = item.Split(new[] { ':' });Di2015NewLine            // Here we create a new anonymous type holding our numbersDi2015NewLine            // No need to define a new dummy class!Di2015NewLine            return new {Di2015NewLine                FirstNumber = int.Parse(s[0]),Di2015NewLine                SecondNumber = int.Parse(s[1])Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLine        })Di2015NewLine        // Now that we've got our objects, let's sort themDi2015NewLine        .OrderByDescending(x => x.FirstNumber)Di2015NewLine        .ThenBy(x => x.SecondNumber)Di2015NewLine        // Finally, now that we're sorted properly, let's format our string list outputDi2015NewLine        .Select(x => x.FirstNumber + ":" + x.SecondNumber)Di2015NewLine        .ToList();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
5527425Di2015UniqueSeparator2:0 1:0 0:0 2:1 1:1 0:1
5527425Di2015UniqueSeparator.OrderBy(x => x.SecondNumber)Di2015NewLine.ThenByDescending(x => x.FirstNumber)Di2015NewLine

5530439Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass Parent {Di2015NewLine    public Parent() {}Di2015NewLine    public Parent(int x) {}Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass Child : Parent {Di2015NewLine    public Child(int x) : base(x) {Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
5530439Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass Parent {Di2015NewLine    public Parent(int x) {}Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass Child : Parent {Di2015NewLine    // This will not compile without "base(x)"Di2015NewLine    public Child(int x) : base(x) {Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5530600Di2015UniqueSeparator/*Di2015NewLineAn Algorithm for Automatically Fitting Digitized CurvesDi2015NewLineby Philip J. SchneiderDi2015NewLinefrom "Graphics Gems", Academic Press, 1990Di2015NewLine*/Di2015NewLinepublic static class FitCurvesDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /*  Fit the Bezier curves */Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private const int MAXPOINTS = 10000;Di2015NewLine    public static List<Point> FitCurve(Point[] d, double error)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Vector tHat1, tHat2;    /*  Unit tangent vectors at endpoints */Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tHat1 = ComputeLeftTangent(d, 0);Di2015NewLine        tHat2 = ComputeRightTangent(d, d.Length - 1);Di2015NewLine        List<Point> result = new List<Point>();Di2015NewLine        FitCubic(d, 0, d.Length - 1, tHat1, tHat2, error,result);Di2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void FitCubic(Point[] d, int first, int last, Vector tHat1, Vector tHat2, double error,List<Point> result)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Point[] bezCurve; /*Control points of fitted Bezier curve*/Di2015NewLine        double[] u;     /*  Parameter values for point  */Di2015NewLine        double[] uPrime;    /*  Improved parameter values */Di2015NewLine        double maxError;    /*  Maximum fitting error    */Di2015NewLine        int splitPoint; /*  Point to split point set at  */Di2015NewLine        int nPts;       /*  Number of points in subset  */Di2015NewLine        double iterationError; /*Error below which you try iterating  */Di2015NewLine        int maxIterations = 4; /*  Max times to try iterating  */Di2015NewLine        Vector tHatCenter;      /* Unit tangent vector at splitPoint */Di2015NewLine        int i;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        iterationError = error * error;Di2015NewLine        nPts = last - first + 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /*  Use heuristic if region only has two points in it */Di2015NewLine        if(nPts == 2)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            double dist = (d[first]-d[last]).Length / 3.0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            bezCurve = new Point[4];Di2015NewLine            bezCurve[0] = d[first];Di2015NewLine            bezCurve[3] = d[last];Di2015NewLine            bezCurve[1] = (tHat1 * dist) + bezCurve[0];Di2015NewLine            bezCurve[2] = (tHat2 * dist) + bezCurve[3];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            result.Add(bezCurve[1]);Di2015NewLine            result.Add(bezCurve[2]);Di2015NewLine            result.Add(bezCurve[3]);Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /*  Parameterize points, and attempt to fit curve */Di2015NewLine        u = ChordLengthParameterize(d, first, last);Di2015NewLine        bezCurve = GenerateBezier(d, first, last, u, tHat1, tHat2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /*  Find max deviation of points to fitted curve */Di2015NewLine        maxError = ComputeMaxError(d, first, last, bezCurve, u,out splitPoint);Di2015NewLine        if(maxError < error)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            result.Add(bezCurve[1]);Di2015NewLine            result.Add(bezCurve[2]);Di2015NewLine            result.Add(bezCurve[3]);Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /*  If error not too large, try some reparameterization  */Di2015NewLine        /*  and iteration */Di2015NewLine        if(maxError < iterationError)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for(i = 0; i < maxIterations; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                uPrime = Reparameterize(d, first, last, u, bezCurve);Di2015NewLine                bezCurve = GenerateBezier(d, first, last, uPrime, tHat1, tHat2);Di2015NewLine                maxError = ComputeMaxError(d, first, last,Di2015NewLine                           bezCurve, uPrime,out splitPoint);Di2015NewLine                if(maxError < error)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    result.Add(bezCurve[1]);Di2015NewLine                    result.Add(bezCurve[2]);Di2015NewLine                    result.Add(bezCurve[3]);Di2015NewLine                    return;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                u = uPrime;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /* Fitting failed -- split at max error point and fit recursively */Di2015NewLine        tHatCenter = ComputeCenterTangent(d, splitPoint);Di2015NewLine        FitCubic(d, first, splitPoint, tHat1, tHatCenter, error,result);Di2015NewLine        tHatCenter.Negate();Di2015NewLine        FitCubic(d, splitPoint, last, tHatCenter, tHat2, error,result);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static Point[] GenerateBezier(Point[] d, int first, int last, double[] uPrime, Vector tHat1, Vector tHat2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int     i;Di2015NewLine        Vector[,] A = new Vector[MAXPOINTS,2];/* Precomputed rhs for eqn    */Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int     nPts;           /* Number of pts in sub-curve */Di2015NewLine        double[,]   C = new double[2,2];            /* Matrix C     */Di2015NewLine        double[]    X = new double[2];          /* Matrix X         */Di2015NewLine        double  det_C0_C1,      /* Determinants of matrices */Di2015NewLine                det_C0_X,Di2015NewLine                det_X_C1;Di2015NewLine        double  alpha_l,        /* Alpha values, left and right */Di2015NewLine                alpha_r;Di2015NewLine        Vector  tmp;            /* Utility variable     */Di2015NewLine        Point[] bezCurve = new Point[4];    /* RETURN bezier curve ctl pts  */Di2015NewLine        nPts = last - first + 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /* Compute the A's  */Di2015NewLine            for (i = 0; i < nPts; i++) {Di2015NewLine                Vector      v1, v2;Di2015NewLine                v1 = tHat1;Di2015NewLine                v2 = tHat2;Di2015NewLine                v1 *= B1(uPrime[i]);Di2015NewLine                v2 *= B2(uPrime[i]);Di2015NewLine                A[i,0] = v1;Di2015NewLine                A[i,1] = v2;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            /* Create the C and X matrices  */Di2015NewLine            C[0,0] = 0.0;Di2015NewLine            C[0,1] = 0.0;Di2015NewLine            C[1,0] = 0.0;Di2015NewLine            C[1,1] = 0.0;Di2015NewLine            X[0]    = 0.0;Di2015NewLine            X[1]    = 0.0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (i = 0; i < nPts; i++) {Di2015NewLine                C[0,0] +=  V2Dot(A[i,0], A[i,0]);Di2015NewLine                C[0,1] += V2Dot(A[i,0], A[i,1]);Di2015NewLine        /*                  C[1][0] += V2Dot(&A[i][0], &A[i][9]);*/ Di2015NewLine                C[1,0] = C[0,1];Di2015NewLine                C[1,1] += V2Dot(A[i,1], A[i,1]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                tmp = ((Vector)d[first + i] -Di2015NewLine                    (Di2015NewLine                      ((Vector)d[first] * B0(uPrime[i])) +Di2015NewLine                        (Di2015NewLine                            ((Vector)d[first] * B1(uPrime[i])) +Di2015NewLine                                    (Di2015NewLine                                    ((Vector)d[last] * B2(uPrime[i])) +Di2015NewLine                                        ((Vector)d[last] * B3(uPrime[i]))))));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            X[0] += V2Dot(A[i,0], tmp);Di2015NewLine            X[1] += V2Dot(A[i,1], tmp);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            /* Compute the determinants of C and X  */Di2015NewLine            det_C0_C1 = C[0,0] * C[1,1] - C[1,0] * C[0,1];Di2015NewLine            det_C0_X  = C[0,0] * X[1]    - C[1,0] * X[0];Di2015NewLine            det_X_C1  = X[0]    * C[1,1] - X[1]    * C[0,1];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            /* Finally, derive alpha values */Di2015NewLine            alpha_l = (det_C0_C1 == 0) ? 0.0 : det_X_C1 / det_C0_C1;Di2015NewLine            alpha_r = (det_C0_C1 == 0) ? 0.0 : det_C0_X / det_C0_C1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            /* If alpha negative, use the Wu/Barsky heuristic (see text) */Di2015NewLine            /* (if alpha is 0, you get coincident control points that lead toDi2015NewLine             * divide by zero in any subsequent NewtonRaphsonRootFind() call. */Di2015NewLine            double segLength = (d[first] - d[last]).Length;Di2015NewLine            double epsilon = 1.0e-6 * segLength;Di2015NewLine            if (alpha_l < epsilon || alpha_r < epsilon)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                /* fall back on standard (probably inaccurate) formula, and subdivide further if needed. */Di2015NewLine                double dist = segLength / 3.0;Di2015NewLine                bezCurve[0] = d[first];Di2015NewLine                bezCurve[3] = d[last];Di2015NewLine                bezCurve[1] = (tHat1 * dist) + bezCurve[0];Di2015NewLine                bezCurve[2] = (tHat2 * dist) + bezCurve[3];Di2015NewLine                return (bezCurve);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            /*  First and last control points of the Bezier curve are */Di2015NewLine            /*  positioned exactly at the first and last data points */Di2015NewLine            /*  Control points 1 and 2 are positioned an alpha distance out */Di2015NewLine            /*  on the tangent vectors, left and right, respectively */Di2015NewLine            bezCurve[0] = d[first];Di2015NewLine            bezCurve[3] = d[last];Di2015NewLine            bezCurve[1] = (tHat1 * alpha_l) + bezCurve[0];Di2015NewLine            bezCurve[2] = (tHat2 * alpha_r) + bezCurve[3];Di2015NewLine            return (bezCurve);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /*Di2015NewLine         *  Reparameterize:Di2015NewLine         *  Given set of points and their parameterization, try to findDi2015NewLine         *   a better parameterization.Di2015NewLine         *Di2015NewLine         */Di2015NewLine        static double[] Reparameterize(Point[] d,int first,int last,double[] u,Point[] bezCurve)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int     nPts = last-first+1;    Di2015NewLine            int     i;Di2015NewLine            double[]    uPrime = new double[nPts];      /*  New parameter values    */Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (i = first; i <= last; i++) {Di2015NewLine                uPrime[i-first] = NewtonRaphsonRootFind(bezCurve, d[i], u[i-first]);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return uPrime;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /*Di2015NewLine         *  NewtonRaphsonRootFind :Di2015NewLine         *  Use Newton-Raphson iteration to find better root.Di2015NewLine         */Di2015NewLine        static double NewtonRaphsonRootFind(Point[] Q,Point P,double u)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            double      numerator, denominator;Di2015NewLine            Point[]     Q1 = new Point[3], Q2 = new Point[2];   /*  Q' and Q''          */Di2015NewLine            Point       Q_u, Q1_u, Q2_u; /*u evaluated at Q, Q', & Q''  */Di2015NewLine            double      uPrime;     /*  Improved u          */Di2015NewLine            int         i;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            /* Compute Q(u) */Di2015NewLine            Q_u = BezierII(3, Q, u);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            /* Generate control vertices for Q' */Di2015NewLine            for (i = 0; i <= 2; i++) {Di2015NewLine                Q1[i].X = (Q[i+1].X - Q[i].X) * 3.0;Di2015NewLine                Q1[i].Y = (Q[i+1].Y - Q[i].Y) * 3.0;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            /* Generate control vertices for Q'' */Di2015NewLine            for (i = 0; i <= 1; i++) {Di2015NewLine                Q2[i].X = (Q1[i+1].X - Q1[i].X) * 2.0;Di2015NewLine                Q2[i].Y = (Q1[i+1].Y - Q1[i].Y) * 2.0;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            /* Compute Q'(u) and Q''(u) */Di2015NewLine            Q1_u = BezierII(2, Q1, u);Di2015NewLine            Q2_u = BezierII(1, Q2, u);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            /* Compute f(u)/f'(u) */Di2015NewLine            numerator = (Q_u.X - P.X) * (Q1_u.X) + (Q_u.Y - P.Y) * (Q1_u.Y);Di2015NewLine            denominator = (Q1_u.X) * (Q1_u.X) + (Q1_u.Y) * (Q1_u.Y) +Di2015NewLine                          (Q_u.X - P.X) * (Q2_u.X) + (Q_u.Y - P.Y) * (Q2_u.Y);Di2015NewLine            if (denominator == 0.0f) return u;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            /* u = u - f(u)/f'(u) */Di2015NewLine            uPrime = u - (numerator/denominator);Di2015NewLine            return (uPrime);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /*Di2015NewLine         *  Bezier :Di2015NewLine         *      Evaluate a Bezier curve at a particular parameter valueDi2015NewLine         * Di2015NewLine         */Di2015NewLine        static Point BezierII(int degree,Point[] V,double t)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int     i, j;       Di2015NewLine            Point   Q;          /* Point on curve at parameter t    */Di2015NewLine            Point[]     Vtemp;      /* Local copy of control points     */Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            /* Copy array   */Di2015NewLine            Vtemp = new Point[degree+1];Di2015NewLine            for (i = 0; i <= degree; i++) {Di2015NewLine                Vtemp[i] = V[i];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            /* Triangle computation */Di2015NewLine            for (i = 1; i <= degree; i++) { Di2015NewLine                for (j = 0; j <= degree-i; j++) {Di2015NewLine                    Vtemp[j].X = (1.0 - t) * Vtemp[j].X + t * Vtemp[j+1].X;Di2015NewLine                    Vtemp[j].Y = (1.0 - t) * Vtemp[j].Y + t * Vtemp[j+1].Y;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Q = Vtemp[0];Di2015NewLine            return Q;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /*Di2015NewLine         *  B0, B1, B2, B3 :Di2015NewLine         *  Bezier multipliersDi2015NewLine         */Di2015NewLine        static double B0(double u)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            double tmp = 1.0 - u;Di2015NewLine            return (tmp * tmp * tmp);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static double B1(double u)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            double tmp = 1.0 - u;Di2015NewLine            return (3 * u * (tmp * tmp));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static double B2(double u)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            double tmp = 1.0 - u;Di2015NewLine            return (3 * u * u * tmp);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static double B3(double u)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return (u * u * u);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /*Di2015NewLine         * ComputeLeftTangent, ComputeRightTangent, ComputeCenterTangent :Di2015NewLine         *Approximate unit tangents at endpoints and "center" of digitized curveDi2015NewLine         */Di2015NewLine        static Vector ComputeLeftTangent(Point[] d,int end)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Vector  tHat1;Di2015NewLine            tHat1 = d[end+1]- d[end];Di2015NewLine            tHat1.Normalize();Di2015NewLine            return tHat1;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static Vector ComputeRightTangent(Point[] d,int end)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Vector  tHat2;Di2015NewLine            tHat2 = d[end-1] - d[end];Di2015NewLine            tHat2.Normalize();Di2015NewLine            return tHat2;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static Vector ComputeCenterTangent(Point[] d,int center)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Vector  V1, V2, tHatCenter = new Vector();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            V1 = d[center-1] - d[center];Di2015NewLine            V2 = d[center] - d[center+1];Di2015NewLine            tHatCenter.X = (V1.X + V2.X)/2.0;Di2015NewLine            tHatCenter.Y = (V1.Y + V2.Y)/2.0;Di2015NewLine            tHatCenter.Normalize();Di2015NewLine            return tHatCenter;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /*Di2015NewLine         *  ChordLengthParameterize :Di2015NewLine         *  Assign parameter values to digitized points Di2015NewLine         *  using relative distances between points.Di2015NewLine         */Di2015NewLine        static double[] ChordLengthParameterize(Point[] d,int first,int last)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int     i;  Di2015NewLine            double[]    u = new double[last-first+1];           /*  Parameterization        */Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            u[0] = 0.0;Di2015NewLine            for (i = first+1; i <= last; i++) {Di2015NewLine                u[i-first] = u[i-first-1] + (d[i-1] - d[i]).Length;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (i = first + 1; i <= last; i++) {Di2015NewLine                u[i-first] = u[i-first] / u[last-first];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return u;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /*Di2015NewLine         *  ComputeMaxError :Di2015NewLine         *  Find the maximum squared distance of digitized pointsDi2015NewLine         *  to fitted curve.Di2015NewLine        */Di2015NewLine        static double ComputeMaxError(Point[] d,int first,int last,Point[] bezCurve,double[] u,out int splitPoint)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int     i;Di2015NewLine            double  maxDist;        /*  Maximum error       */Di2015NewLine            double  dist;       /*  Current error       */Di2015NewLine            Point   P;          /*  Point on curve      */Di2015NewLine            Vector  v;          /*  Vector from point to curve  */Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            splitPoint = (last - first + 1)/2;Di2015NewLine            maxDist = 0.0;Di2015NewLine            for (i = first + 1; i < last; i++) {Di2015NewLine                P = BezierII(3, bezCurve, u[i-first]);Di2015NewLine                v = P - d[i];Di2015NewLine                dist = v.LengthSquared;Di2015NewLine                if (dist >= maxDist) {Di2015NewLine                    maxDist = dist;Di2015NewLine                    splitPoint = i;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return maxDist;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static double V2Dot(Vector a,Vector b) Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return((a.X*b.X)+(a.Y*b.Y));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5530680Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar values = new List<string>();Di2015NewLinefor(int i = 0; i < 3; i++)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    values.Add("");   // or values.Add(String.Empty);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5531275Di2015UniqueSeparator<Window x:Class="Expander.Views.MainView"Di2015NewLine  xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation"Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override long PositionDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return baseStream.Position;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        setDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            baseStream.Position = value;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override int Read(byte[] buffer, int offset, int count)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return baseStream.Read(buffer, offset, count);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override long Seek(long offset, System.IO.SeekOrigin origin)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return baseStream.Seek(offset, origin);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override void SetLength(long value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        baseStream.SetLength(value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override void Write(byte[] buffer, int offset, int count)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Get text from response stream.Di2015NewLine        string originalText = System.Text.Encoding.UTF8.GetString(buffer, offset, count);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Alter the text.Di2015NewLine        originalText = originalText.Replace("/WebResource.axd", "WebResource.axd");Di2015NewLine        //Write the altered text to the response stream.Di2015NewLine        buffer = System.Text.Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(originalText);Di2015NewLine        this.baseStream.Write(buffer, 0, buffer.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

5538605Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate ISessionFactory BuildSessionFactory(bool useOracleMapping)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Configuration config = new Configuration();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    config.SetProperty(NHibernate.Cfg.Environment.ConnectionProvider, "...");Di2015NewLine    config.SetProperty(NHibernate.Cfg.Environment.Dialect, "...");Di2015NewLine    config.SetProperty(NHibernate.Cfg.Environment.ConnectionDriver, "...");Di2015NewLine    config.SetProperty(NHibernate.Cfg.Environment.ConnectionString, "...");Di2015NewLine    config.SetProperty(NHibernate.Cfg.Environment.Isolation, "Serializable");Di2015NewLine    config.SetProperty(NHibernate.Cfg.Environment.ProxyFactoryFactoryClass, "...");Di2015NewLine    config.SetProperty(NHibernate.Cfg.Environment.ShowSql, "true");Di2015NewLine    config.SetProperty(NHibernate.Cfg.Environment.Hbm2ddlKeyWords, "none");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // filter hbm FilesDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Set reference to entity assemblyDi2015NewLine    System.Reflection.Assembly assembly = System.Reflection.Assembly.GetAssembly(typeof(MyEntity));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // get Resource-filesDi2015NewLine    string[] resources = assembly.GetManifestResourceNames();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // scan through all the hbm files and filter them according to the parameterDi2015NewLine    foreach (string hbmFile in resources)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // This filtering here could probably be done simpler, but this is easy to understandDi2015NewLine        bool addFile = false;Di2015NewLine        // ignore any file that does not end with .hbm.xmlDi2015NewLine        if (hbmFile.EndsWith(".hbm.xml"))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (hbmFile.ToLower().EndsWith(".default.hbm.xml"))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (!useOracleMapping)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // we want that file for this SessionFactoryDi2015NewLine                    addFile = true;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (hbmFile.ToLower().EndsWith(".oracle.hbm.xml"))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (useOracleMapping)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // we want that file for this SessionFactoryDi2015NewLine                    addFile = true;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // neither default nor oracle -> we want that file no matter whatDi2015NewLine                addFile = true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (addFile)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                using (System.IO.StreamReader sr = new System.IO.StreamReader(assembly.GetManifestResourceStream(hbmFile)))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    string resourceContent = sr.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLine                    config.AddXmlString(resourceContent);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // create Sessionfactory with the files we filteredDi2015NewLine    ISessionFactory sessionFactory = config.BuildSessionFactory();Di2015NewLine    return sessionFactory;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5539126Di2015UniqueSeparator<%@ WebHandler Language='C#' Class='addBarcodeWithStamper' %>Di2015NewLineusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineusing System.Web;Di2015NewLineusing iTextSharp.text;  Di2015NewLineusing iTextSharp.text.pdf; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class addBarcodeWithStamper : IHttpHandler {Di2015NewLine  public void ProcessRequest (HttpContext context) {Di2015NewLine    HttpResponse Response = context.Response;Di2015NewLine    Response.ContentType = "application/pdf";Di2015NewLine    PdfReader reader = new PdfReader(context.Server.MapPath(PATH_TO_PDF));Di2015NewLine/*Di2015NewLine * save __one__ instance of barcode image;Di2015NewLine * see MakeBarcode() method belowDi2015NewLine */Di2015NewLine    iTextSharp.text.Image barcode = null;Di2015NewLine    float barcodeWidth = 0;Di2015NewLine    float barcodeHeight = 0;Di2015NewLine    using (PdfStamper stamper = new PdfStamper(reader, Response.OutputStream)) Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      int n = reader.NumberOfPages;Di2015NewLine      for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {Di2015NewLine        PdfContentByte cb = stamper.GetOverContent(i);Di2015NewLine/*Di2015NewLine *  re-use image bytes so they are added only __once__Di2015NewLine */Di2015NewLine        if (barcode == null) {Di2015NewLine          barcode = MakeBarcode(cb);Di2015NewLine          barcodeWidth= barcode.Width;Di2015NewLine          barcodeHeight= barcode.Height;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine/*Di2015NewLine * calculate in case individual page sizes are differentDi2015NewLine */Di2015NewLine        Rectangle rect = stamper.Reader.GetPageSize(i);Di2015NewLine        float x = (rect.Width - barcodeWidth) / 2;Di2015NewLine// modify/remove 10 offset as you see fitDi2015NewLine        float y = rect.Top - barcodeHeight - 10;Di2015NewLine        barcode.SetAbsolutePosition(x, y);Di2015NewLine        cb.AddImage(barcode);Di2015NewLine      }    Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  public bool IsReusable {Di2015NewLine    get { return false; }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine// ----------------------------------------------------------------------------  Di2015NewLine  public iTextSharp.text.Image MakeBarcode(PdfContentByte cb) {Di2015NewLine    Barcode128 barcode128 = new Barcode128();Di2015NewLine    string text2 = "650-M5-013";Di2015NewLine    barcode128.Code = text2;Di2015NewLine    barcode128.ChecksumText = true;        Di2015NewLine    return barcode128.CreateImageWithBarcode(cb, null, null);  Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5540320Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string HashGroups(string user)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    DirectoryEntry directoryEntry = default(DirectoryEntry);Di2015NewLine    DirectorySearcher dirSearcher = default(DirectorySearcher);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    List<string> result = new List<string>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    directoryEntry = new DirectoryEntry("LDAP://<YOUR_DOMAIN>");Di2015NewLine    directoryEntry.RefreshCache();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Get search object, specify filter and scope, Di2015NewLine    // perform search. Di2015NewLine    dirSearcher = new DirectorySearcher(directoryEntry);Di2015NewLine    dirSearcher.PropertiesToLoad.Add("memberOf");Di2015NewLine    dirSearcher.Filter = "(&(sAMAccountName=" + user + "))";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    SearchResult sr = dirSearcher.FindOne();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Enumerate groups Di2015NewLine    foreach (string group in sr.Properties["memberOf"])Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        result.Add(group);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // OrderBy is important! Otherwise, your hash might fail because Di2015NewLine    // the groups come back in different order.Di2015NewLine    MD5 md5 = MD5.Create();Di2015NewLine    Byte[] inputBytes = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(result.OrderBy(s1 => s1).SelectMany(s2 => s2).ToArray());Di2015NewLine    byte[] hash = md5.ComputeHash(inputBytes);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < hash.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        sb.Append(hash[i].ToString("X2"));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5541505Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class FilterDefinitionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public bool FilterByName { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public string NameFrom { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public string NameTo { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool FilterByQuantity { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public double QuantityFrom { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public double QuantityTo { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
5541505Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic IQueryable<SomeEntity> GetQuery(FilterDefinition filter)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    IQueryable<SomeEntity> query = context.Set<SomeEntity>();Di2015NewLine    // assuming that you return all records when nothing is specified in the filterDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (filter.FilterByName)Di2015NewLine        query = query.Where(t => Di2015NewLine            t.Name >= filter.NameFrom && t.Name <= filter.NameTo);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (filter.FilterByQuantity)Di2015NewLine        query = query.Where(t => Di2015NewLine            t.Quantity >= filter.QuantityFrom && t.Quantity <= filter.QuantityTo);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return query;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5543006Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic class EnumExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static IEnumerable<Enum> GetFlags(this Enum value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return GetFlags(value, Enum.GetValues(value.GetType()).Cast<Enum>().ToArray());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static IEnumerable<Enum> GetIndividualFlags(this Enum value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return GetFlags(value, GetFlagValues(value.GetType()).ToArray());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static IEnumerable<Enum> GetFlags(Enum value, Enum[] values)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ulong bits = Convert.ToUInt64(value);Di2015NewLine        List<Enum> results = new List<Enum>();Di2015NewLine        for (int i = values.Length - 1; i >= 0; i--)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ulong mask = Convert.ToUInt64(values[i]);Di2015NewLine            if (i == 0 && mask == 0L)Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            if ((bits & mask) == mask)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                results.Add(values[i]);Di2015NewLine                bits -= mask;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (bits != 0L)Di2015NewLine            return Enumerable.Empty<Enum>();Di2015NewLine        if (Convert.ToUInt64(value) != 0L)Di2015NewLine            return results.Reverse<Enum>();Di2015NewLine        if (bits == Convert.ToUInt64(value) && values.Length > 0 && Convert.ToUInt64(values[0]) == 0L)Di2015NewLine            return values.Take(1);Di2015NewLine        return Enumerable.Empty<Enum>();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static IEnumerable<Enum> GetFlagValues(Type enumType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ulong flag = 0x1;Di2015NewLine        foreach (var value in Enum.GetValues(enumType).Cast<Enum>())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ulong bits = Convert.ToUInt64(value);Di2015NewLine            if (bits == 0L)Di2015NewLine                //yield return value;Di2015NewLine                continue; // skip the zero valueDi2015NewLine            while (flag < bits) flag <<= 1;Di2015NewLine            if (flag == bits)Di2015NewLine                yield return value;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
5543063Di2015UniqueSeparatorPlaceHolder p = (PlaceHolder)FindControlRecursive(Page, "PlaceHolder1");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static Control FindControlRecursive(Control ctrl, string controlID)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine if (string.Compare(ctrl.ID, controlID, true) == 0)Di2015NewLine {Di2015NewLine  // We found the control!Di2015NewLine  return ctrl;Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine elseDi2015NewLine {Di2015NewLine  // Recurse through ctrl's Controls collectionsDi2015NewLine  foreach (Control child in ctrl.Controls)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine   Control lookFor = FindControlRecursive(child, controlID);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   if (lookFor != null)Di2015NewLine   return lookFor;  // We found the controlDi2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine // If we reach here, control was not foundDi2015NewLine return null;Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5550541Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ImageController : ControllerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ActionResult Test()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var text = DateTime.Now.ToString();Di2015NewLine        var font = new Font("Arial", 20, FontStyle.Regular);Di2015NewLine        var angle = 233;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        SizeF textSize = GetEvenTextImageSize(text, font);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        SizeF imageSize;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (angle == 0)Di2015NewLine            imageSize = textSize;Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            imageSize = GetRotatedTextImageSize(textSize, angle);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (var canvas = new Bitmap((int)imageSize.Width, (int)imageSize.Height))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            using(var graphics = Graphics.FromImage(canvas))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                graphics.InterpolationMode = InterpolationMode.HighQualityBicubic;Di2015NewLine                graphics.SmoothingMode = SmoothingMode.HighQuality;Di2015NewLine                graphics.TextRenderingHint = TextRenderingHint.SingleBitPerPixelGridFit;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                SizeF textContainerSize = graphics.VisibleClipBounds.Size;Di2015NewLine                graphics.TranslateTransform(textContainerSize.Width / 2, textContainerSize.Height / 2);Di2015NewLine                graphics.RotateTransform(angle);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                graphics.DrawString(text, font, Brushes.Black, -(textSize.Width / 2), -(textSize.Height / 2));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var stream = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLine            canvas.Save(stream, ImageFormat.Png);Di2015NewLine            stream.Seek(0, SeekOrigin.Begin);Di2015NewLine            return new FileStreamResult(stream, "image/png");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static SizeF GetEvenTextImageSize(string text, Font font)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (var image = new Bitmap(1, 1, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            using (Graphics graphics = Graphics.FromImage(image))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return graphics.MeasureString(text, font);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static SizeF GetRotatedTextImageSize(SizeF fontSize, int angle)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Source: http://www.codeproject.com/KB/graphics/rotateimage.aspxDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        double theta = angle * Math.PI / 180.0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (theta < 0.0)Di2015NewLine            theta += 2 * Math.PI;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        double adjacentTop, oppositeTop;Di2015NewLine        double adjacentBottom, oppositeBottom;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if ((theta >= 0.0 && theta < Math.PI / 2.0) || (theta >= Math.PI && theta < (Math.PI + (Math.PI / 2.0))))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            adjacentTop = Math.Abs(Math.Cos(theta)) * fontSize.Width;Di2015NewLine            oppositeTop = Math.Abs(Math.Sin(theta)) * fontSize.Width;Di2015NewLine            adjacentBottom = Math.Abs(Math.Cos(theta)) * fontSize.Height;Di2015NewLine            oppositeBottom = Math.Abs(Math.Sin(theta)) * fontSize.Height;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            adjacentTop = Math.Abs(Math.Sin(theta)) * fontSize.Height;Di2015NewLine            oppositeTop = Math.Abs(Math.Cos(theta)) * fontSize.Height;Di2015NewLine            adjacentBottom = Math.Abs(Math.Sin(theta)) * fontSize.Width;Di2015NewLine            oppositeBottom = Math.Abs(Math.Cos(theta)) * fontSize.Width;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int nWidth = (int)Math.Ceiling(adjacentTop + oppositeBottom);Di2015NewLine        int nHeight = (int)Math.Ceiling(adjacentBottom + oppositeTop);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return new SizeF(nWidth, nHeight);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5554047Di2015UniqueSeparatorThrowDarts
5554047Di2015UniqueSeparatorRandom
5554047Di2015UniqueSeparatorParallel.For
5554047Di2015UniqueSeparatorRandom
5554047Di2015UniqueSeparator    protected override int CountInterationsInsideCircle()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ConcurrentBag<int> results = new ConcurrentBag<int>();Di2015NewLine        Parallel.For(0, _numInterations,Di2015NewLine                     // initialise each thread by setting it's hit count to 0Di2015NewLine                     () => new LoopThreadState(),Di2015NewLine                     // in the body, we throw one dart and see whether it hit or notDi2015NewLine                     (iteration, _, localState) =>Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            localState.Count += ThrowDarts(1, localState.RandomNumberGenerator);Di2015NewLine                            return localState;Di2015NewLine                        },Di2015NewLine                     // finally, we sum (in a thread-safe way) all the hit counts of each thread togetherDi2015NewLine                     result => results.Add(result.Count));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int finalResult = 0;Di2015NewLine        foreach (int threadresult in results)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            finalResult += threadresult;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return finalResult;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

5554957Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic interface IRuleDefinitionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    String PropertyName { get; }Di2015NewLine    String Message { get; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class ValidationRule<T>: IRuleDefinitionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public String PropertyName { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine    public String Message { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private Func<T, Boolean> _isValidDelegate;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ValidationRule(Func<T, Boolean> isValidDelegate, String propertyName, String message)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        PropertyName = propertyName;Di2015NewLine        Message = message;Di2015NewLine        _isValidDelegate = isValidDelegate;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Boolean IsValid(T objToValidate)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return _isValidDelegate(objToValidate);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class Validator<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private List<ValidationRule<T>> _validationRules = new List<ValidationRule<T>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void AddRule(Func<T, Boolean> isValidDelegate, String propertyName = null, String message = null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _validationRules.Add(new ValidationRule<T>(isValidDelegate, propertyName, message));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Boolean IsValid(T objToValidate)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return _validationRules.Any(vr => vr.IsValid(objToValidate));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IEnumerable<IRuleDefinition> GetViolations(T objToValidate)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return _validationRulesDi2015NewLine             .Where(vr => !vr.IsValid(objToValidate))Di2015NewLine             .Cast<IRuleDefinition>();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
